Reviews.Title: Love it love it love it!
Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: There is not much more I can say other then this tablet it amazing! Its my first and after months and months of research and comparing, Im so happy I chose this one!

Reviews.Title: easiest most user friendly tablet out there.
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: We choose Kindle because not only can we read the greatest books but also stream  Great movies and programs. We can travel easily with it as it takes only a small amount of space and works almost as well as a laptop . Everyone can use it from our 2yr old grandson on up.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: P. F. Navas
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use all the features, but the main reason I bought it was for reading and it's met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: K. Funk "kfunk"
Reviews.Content: Brought for my mother who has lost 90% of her eyesight and loves to read. She love this new kindle with the Mayday and text to speech. This has made her life much easy and a little less stressful. Thank you Amazon again are number 1 with us.

Reviews.Title: difficult to see outdoors, battery drains fast, camera doesn't work well.
Reviews.Author: Lee100
Reviews.Content: I've been using the device for several hours now, I noticed several issues:The advertisement says HDX makes things easier to see in "any lighting conditions, including outdoors." this is misleading: even at maximum brightness it's hard to see what's on the screen when ambient light is bright (I tested it inside a car, it was bright outside, but the screen was not exposed to direct sunlight).The advertisement says Kindle has "12 hours mixed use" battery life, this is again misleading, the battery drains very quickly if you do anything at all, (down to 60% in less than one hour)A third issue is with the Camera:  when taking picture, the kindle was always trying to focus. it makes taking pictures difficult.

Reviews.Title: Connectivity
Reviews.Author: Nicole K
Reviews.Content: In general, I'm pleased with my Kindle Fire HDX.  However, I do have an issue with wi-fi connectivity.  Quite often apps won't load or web pages due to the device thinking it's not connected to the internet when in fact it is.  The only way to fix this issue that I have found is to power the unit down and restart it.  This becomes a little annoying when I'm restarting it for the 4th time in one day.

Reviews.Title: I love this!
Reviews.Author: J. Coy
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a the original Kindle and I dearly love this one (I loved my old one too). I like the fact that I can play my dumb games on it, I can do my facebook and pinterest time. The resolution is superb!! It is thin and lightweight and has a nice backing that doesn't slip through your hands. It's a pleasure to read on it, or do anything on it.If I had one complaint it's that I can only do one thing at a time on it.I also don't like the fact that I have to go into the settings to kill off apps and clear the cache - but I can live with that. Someday I'll find a good app killer for it.I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet! I think there are plenty of games available for it, but have seen reviews that say there aren't enough.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: i love it don't think i would have been any happier if i would have spent more money and purchased a ipad

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Hart
Reviews.Content: This is a great product with great options and easy to handle. I like it very much and keep it by my side constantly.

Reviews.Title: A bigger screen helps and is a big plus
Reviews.Author: John Hanley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle (my 3rd) before Christmas. I have not been a big fan of reading devices before as they were too small.However, this Kindle Fire is big enough that I can use it whenever I want. I am seeing impaired and by double tapping a web page I can comfortably use this Kindle.Note: I do not use the Kindle for book reading (my girlfriend does and often wants it first after dinner). I use it primarily to keep up to date on my work or hobbies for which it is excellently purposed for me. My son uses it to watch Amazon Prime movies with ear-buds.Note: I don't remember when we bought the first Amazon Kindle (five years ago maybe), but all three continue to work with no issues. We have all of the Apple iPad generations also and I would say that they are very close in quality and ease of use. For my family Amazon Prime is the key factor (movies for everyone and the big screen for me and low cost books).

Reviews.Title: Not Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Zito Medeiros
Reviews.Content: I must admit that the picture quality is excellent, but the sound is only mediocre.  It is quick and responds well.  The battery lasts a real long time.  My main disappointment is that the operating system is a modified version of Android.  As a result, many of the apps I am used to on my phone cannot be installed on the Kindle.  One of the main reasons I bought this Kindle was to read one of my magazines that is only digital now.  I downloaded the previous issue with no issues, but when I try to download the current version, I get an error claiming that I have to update some software.  Some of the apps not available are Google Now and Zinio,  I feel like I overpaid for this at $379.  I feel that I should haves hopped around for a Android 4.2 tablet, and i would probably have found something comparable for less than half the price.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love my Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Cara
Reviews.Content: Cannot say enough about my Kindle - it replaces my lap top computer totally.  If I didn't work on my lap top I would probably never open it.  The display is amazing, the sound is clear and distinct, there are what seems like a "zillion" apps in the store.  I'm an avid reader and hate to be without new books. Searching for what you want takes longer than the purchase and transmission.  Does it all, beautifully. Again, LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Ingrid P. Long
Reviews.Content: I was researching the Kindle Fire for quite sometime and when the HDX came out, it was a no-brainer for me.  I really like that it isn't very heavy and it connects me to everything in an instant.  You really don't need more than 16GB.  The display is crisp and the great size screen at 8.9" is perfect. I also have the Special Offers which you really don't notice because you just swipe to "unlock" and it's gone :)

Reviews.Title: E Reader
Reviews.Author: gghia
Reviews.Content: I have owned a previous Kindle and the Sony. Without question this Kindle Fire is easier to read, faster to download, and has become such a part of my life that I use my laptop and phone less. A must buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it better than my ipad
Reviews.Author: reader
Reviews.Content: Got one for my mom and she really appreciates the new features, lighter weight, and the mayday button. Transition for the older model was great. Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: joevas
Reviews.Content: Just recently got it and am setting it up. It is well thought out and, with Amazon's support, it works well for me. I love Silk, the browser, and there is so much available it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX!!  I am somewhat "electronically challenged" and had no desire to own a tablet.  My husband wanted to buy me one for my birthday and I told him not to because I would probably never use it.  Then I saw an ad for the Kindle Fire HDX.  What sold me on it was the "help" feature.  Being able to get help 24/7 from a person who I can actually see on my screen as we are talking, to me, is absolutely fantastic.  (I kind of look at it like I have a helper living right inside my tablet:)).  I have already called for help several times and have waited no longer than maybe 10 or 15 seconds for someone to "show up" and they are always able to help me with whatever question I have.  So far, I have used my Kindle Fire HDX to surf the web and to play games.  I love browsing in the app store, too.  I have watched a couple of tv shows, too.  I plan to download some movies soon and also learn how to download and then listen to music.  I am having so much fun with my Kindle fire HDX!!  (The only complaint I have is that the battery does not last as long as I would like it to).

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, great price, great screen.
Reviews.Author: D. Byrne
Reviews.Content: I also own a Google Nexus 7, and my wife owns a new I-pad. The screen on the HDX blows them both away. The silk browser is super fast, and the OS Fire 3.0 is amazingly fast. I researched tablets very carefully as I had a lot of issues with the Nexus and I-pad. I would HIGHLY recommend the HDX. Get the 8.9 if you take a lot of pictures or video or watch a lot of video. The 7.0 is a little tight. GREAT PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Good not great.  Missed opportunity.
Reviews.Author: GORDON GIRVIN
Reviews.Content: Very good display and very responsive. Sound is weak.Two big mistakes -  no widgets and no other browsers.Hoping for software upgrades.

Reviews.Title: My kindle fire
Reviews.Author: william k. raley
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire HDX 8.9".My wife and son say I don't by myself anything. So the kindle fire HDX is all mine.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Mrs. P. J. Singleton
Reviews.Content: this is my fifth kindle and that is only because it is the larger size. started with the very first one brought out and have continued to purchase over the years since. best thing ever.

Reviews.Title: Not a 'bargain', but worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Norbert Pohl "Car Nut"
Reviews.Content: Amazingly fast. Easy set up. Great screen. Unparalleled tech support system. Good battery life. Takes great pictures, panaorama pics are awesome!Only downside is some popular apps aren't made for it, and some sites don't support this device for their content.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Linda G "Linda G"
Reviews.Content: Best gift i ever received. It Does everything and more. Love it. I play my games, read my books and take care of my emails and web business.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just Love this Kindle. I have had a Kindle Keyboard with 500+ books on it for a couple of years and have enjoyed it too. The Kindle Fire HDX is just incredible. It is so quick with everything. I have loaded it with games for myself and my 5 year old grandson. The Kindle Fire HDX has a great camera too.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sally McEntire
Reviews.Content: So very happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, still learning everything that it does. Took some great pics with it already. I have already recommended this to several friends. Downloaded a guide and it has been very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Angela Lane
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice.  extremely simple to use and even easier to read than expected.  No problems at all.  Absolutely pleased with the purchase.  It was a birthday present for my husband and he is thrilled with it as well.

Reviews.Title: doesn't blow me away
Reviews.Author: Ronald Riccitelli
Reviews.Content: everything is proprietary to amazon. web search and browsing in multiple tabs not there. cannot use Google or Firefox or adobe or anything that isn't amazon. this rates with google's cromebook, the palm, and apple mac vs. windows pc for compatibility with third party software. bottom line it's great if you don't mind buying everything amazon if you can find it!

Reviews.Title: Easy to Setup with exception of Verizon 4G side
Reviews.Author: jvw
Reviews.Content: Great product exactly what I wanted. Easy to setup and use, the only exception was getting my hook up to Verizon.  I already use Verizon so just changed my plan increasing my data limit and sharing the minutes between my phone and the Kindle. I was on the phone with Verizon 3 separate times and they couldn't get me connected. I went to my Verizon store and their technical people at the store got me connected up in about 30 minutes or less.  One catch though there are several Verizon merchants in my town but only one of them was a Verizon company or corporate store, the other smaller stores did not have technicians at their stores. So a word to the wise just call your local store first and ask them if they would be able to help you setup a Kindle Fire HDX with the 4GL before you zip on down to their store.

Reviews.Title: Good graphic and good speed
Reviews.Author: Sophoeuth Seng
Reviews.Content: Everything is good with this device, good graphic, battery life, nice size, easy navigation and more. The downside is that I wish I have the option to extend the storage and put my own picture as the background instead of seeing the black background color all the time.

Reviews.Title: Tinas newest Kindle
Reviews.Author: tcl
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle and the best of them all.The graphics and displAy are great. It automatically goes off so I dontHave. To worry about leaving.it on. 100% better than the first ones

Reviews.Title: Some problems with my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Judith Walker
Reviews.Content: Basically, after I get it figured out, I think I'll like my Kindle.  I was disappointed to find that it wouldn't work @ 3G, so without some wifi, I wasn't able to use a lot of features.  Not a lot of areas have 4G.  Also, after considerable research (on my computer), I learned I could not show any movies on the TV without a $60 device for the TV to connect to the Kindle.  I haven't done this yet.  Another time when the device kept turning off and the touchscreen didn't work, I learned how to correctly reboot it.  I'm still learning.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love this gizmo!
Reviews.Author: wewokadokie
Reviews.Content: I thought my previous kindle fire 8.9 was exceptional, but you just gotta upgrade when you see all the improvements they made with this one! It has met all my expectations, and then some! I find it in my hand every spare minute of the day, and if the truth were known, find myself procrastinating just a little when I need to put it aside a bit....I have a couple of games I go back to over and over, and am building my reading library even more than before....this gizmo is the best!

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: patricia ennis
Reviews.Content: Love it, love it, love it!  Much more than I expected.  I haven't had it very long, but have read several books already.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Letsgorvn
Reviews.Content: I love the HDX! I used to have another type of 'tablet' that had a color screen but it was not as user friendly as the Kindle Fire HDX is. I have already used the "Panic Button" and within 5-15 seconds someone is right there on your Kindle wanting to help you out! And they are there 24 hrs./day. 7days/per week! The greatest thing Amazon has ever come up with! The clarity on the screen is absolutely  indescribable, it is so good!I would absolutely recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Give me Chrome
Reviews.Author: Sodamoca
Reviews.Content: I gave it a 5 star rating but I find there are a couple of flaws with this tablet which if you are aware of them will not cause you much heartburn.  The one that will and that I have yet to find a good work around is the Silk Browser.  I don't like it and I wish I could more easily replace it with a different browser.  No matter how many times I change the search engine it reverts to Bing.  Nothing against Bing but I am a google man.  Taunting me with settings that seem to let me change my default search engine (and it does until you reboot) does not help.This is not Android.  Anymore than Apple OS is Linux.  This is built on an Android core but it is not native Android.  As such some apps are not available for it and some need to be side loaded (download the apk and load it manually).  If you want to always check the latest and greatest of each type of app out there then this might be a big negative for you.  Me? I want to find one I like and never change it again until a major upgrade is demonstrated to me.The App store is more arrogant than Microsoft used to be.  The App store thinks it knows you and it doesn't.  It takes your Amazon purchase history, your books, and then assumes you just want movies, books, and games when it returns search results.  Use google (or Bing I guess) and get software reviews there then search for them specifically.  I like to use the full Amazon online shop and search within Android Apps to get a better return on my search.So why did I give it 5 stars?  It is powerful, its graphics are beautiful, it is exactly what I thought I would be getting and it cost less than other comparable systems I looked at.  I am an Amazon Prime member so it fit with my current online usage and I did my homework and was aware of the flaws and work arounds before I ordered it.  Get some utilities (ES3, Evernote, King Soft Office) to compensate for issues and check to make sure your treasured games are available (no haytown for my wife was an issue) and then decide if it is worth the extra 100 to 200 dollars to get a pure Android device or worth the risk of voiding your support if you root it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: There are not enough stars to calculate how much I love my kindle fire 8.9 HDX. It is super user friendly, the sound and graphics on this are awesome.  The battery life on this is also great.  Thank you Amazon I have been addicted since my first kindle.

Reviews.Title: A must have for us Amazon vets
Reviews.Author: Bio L. Titterington "Bio T."
Reviews.Content: I have the 1st gen Kindle and liked it but then I saw this was coming out and had to have it.The HD screen is great. They moved the speakers to a more logical position for tv/movie viewing and this thing is light. Really light.Battery life is good. I don't even know how they fit a battery into this thing. It's so slim.Only downside is that some of my favorite apps that I have on my iTouch are not available on Kindle. Not a deal breaker but a slight bummer.

Reviews.Title: First tablet
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Love what this can do.  Use it mostly for email, browsing, and games, although I have tried watching a movie, the camera, and music just to see what it can do.  Much faster than my wife's non-HDX 8.9".  The button layout on this is MUCH better than hers too.  Here's some info:Camera:  Only tried a few times, but seems to work well and comes w/ great editing tools.Movies:  Again, only tried a few times but great quality and sound for a device this sound.Email:  I have my company account set up on this and it was a piece of cake to do and works well.Games:  Not much to say....they work great.Web:  It is what it is...browser works fine.

Reviews.Title: very nice except for
Reviews.Author: MNMan
Reviews.Content: While everything works fine, I wanted to stream movies to my TV, but the only things available have a high cost associated with them.  When will someone come up with a cable (micro B to HDMI).

Reviews.Title: Prepare to be entertained. This is the Kindle we have been waiting for.
Reviews.Author: the stout hearted "reinx"
Reviews.Content: Media consumption at its finest! This is the Kindle Amazon has really been striving for it seems. Gutsy(fast and responsive), stylish, and very surprisingly light! The origami case will add a noticeable amount of weight but you will want it to keep this particular piece of tech safe.Browsing the web and reading your favorite books are both immediately satisfying, while the Amazon app store continues to grow its offerings at what seems to me a reasonably competitive rate.The HDX's ability to catch hold of and maintain a signal from your WiFi is solid(impressively so) and will keep you connected for all your Netflix and other streaming needs.And stream you will, because the picture quality is very good. The speakers are not as loud as last gen, but for a tablet I find them adequate for a quick couple of tunes on break or an episode of my favorite TV show before bed.I have occasion to use my HDX for up to 12 hours at a stretch at times and the battery keeps up quite well for reading or researching the occasional article on the net. The included charger and cable will keep you juiced up at a very pleasant rate as well.Bottom line: The kindle as a media consumption device does its job without a hitch. Highly reccomended. The 8.9" screen is still quite handily portable but if you don't mind the loss of screen realestate you can't beat the price of the 7".

Reviews.Title: I love this Kindle fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Beverly A
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" was the first tablet I ever had.  I am computer literate.  I am a novice at this tablet, however it is easy to operate.  I like the idea of having WI-FI and 4G LTE.  I have WI-FI at home but I like the option of using this tablet anywhere instead of looking for a Wi-Fi hotspot when I am traveling.  It is easy to read a book or watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: pumpkin8
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is fantastic.  The screen is high resolution and movies look fantastic on the 8.9 ".  It is very fast.  It also allows android apps to be downloaded. I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Grandma of four
Reviews.Content: Good for reading especially long books!  I like that I can place book vertically or horizontally also for games.  It doesn't add much weight.but the cover is heavy.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet; one shortcoming
Reviews.Author: shopdaddy "musikdaddy"
Reviews.Content: I bought a 32GB Kindle HDX 8.9.  Traded my previous Kindle HD 8.9 which I was very happy with, but I got bit by the "new model" bug.  The HDX tablet is much lighter, has a sharper screen, has faster response, and obviously better WiFi.  The only shortcoming I have to complain about is that Amazon didn't see fit to include HDMI on the HDX as they did on the HD.  I really enjoyed this feature on the HD because I could download a movie, then play it back on any TV with an HDMI port.  Unfortunately, Amazon chose to build in Miracast, a technology to connect to TVs and other devices that is deployed on very new TVs and, apparently, is not yet perfected, based on the plethora of 3-star (and less) reviews of the Miracast adapters sold on Amazon.  It is the reason I didn't give the HDX 5 stars, otherwise, I'd consider it a perfect mobile device.

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Weichselbaum "Chaswax"
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife. At first she was a little worried that it was only for reading books. She was so surprised that it could do almost everything her notebook could do and do it faster. has great speech recognition to use instead of typing. The screen is so big and clear so that even us old people can see and read. Best of all - it made my wife happy.

Reviews.Title: It is very good!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to figure it out, but as I learn how to use it, it is quite the instrument.  It should have had a instruction manual with it.  The biggest fault with the unite is when you go out of town it won't work without being hooked up to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: pumpkin8
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is fantastic.  The screen is high resolution and movies look fantastic on the 8.9 ".  It is very fast.  It also allows android apps to be downloaded. I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Georgetta M. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I pre-ordered it before Amazon was ready to ship. I have the Kindle fire HDX 8.9, 64 GB. Each one has met expectations.  The only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because many of the books now have the table of contents grayed out.  I could see and use the table of contents on previous devices.  However, I have located the table on most books and bookmarked it.The second reason for only 4 stars:  I have purchased 3 cases- looking for the perfect one.  Have not found it yet.  I do not want to raise the camera from the case to take a picture.  One case allows me to take a picture without raising the camera, but there is a black spot hiding the center of the picture, but the picture comes out great. STRANGE!Even though I only gave my 4th Kindle 4 stars, I would not give it up!

Reviews.Title: Nothing like this!!
Reviews.Author: Brenda Prentiss
Reviews.Content: This is my first purchase of a note pad of any kind but I rely don't think I would ever want anything else!  So portable and everything is right there at the touch of your finger. The HD is incredible! Facebook is so easy, my email is set up great. Nothing bad to say about it! I could go on and on but I want to get back to playing! :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome features!! Glad I got it!!
Reviews.Author: Mavisjo
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire!! I already had one of the original ones which I still use because it is more compact & easy to stuff in my purse. I love the neat features the fire had to offer. The color screen is very clear & great for playing games and watching videos. Oh and it of course is great for reading, although as I mentioned I still use my first kindle for most of my reading. I find it has a better screen for outdoors & is more compact & lighter than the fire. I can access all my books on either kindle. I just sync and it picks up whenever I left off, great feature! I have yet to use the mayday app, still learning all it has to offer & haven't felt the need yet. I know I will at some point. If you are considering a kindle vs iPad, I would suggest giving the kindle fire a try, you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: Great Ereader/Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Engineer"
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" about a month ago. I am greatly impressed! Amazon has done a wonderful job with this tablet and, and, product support. No more waiting on line or holding the phone for hours and waiting for call backs. And your credit card number to talk to a rep.  With the May Day feature, just press the button and you have support. Amazon, you deserve 5- thumb ups!!!The hardware is very nice to hold. This tablet is amazingly lightweight and thin. The HDX is very, very comfortable to hold and manage.The screen on the HDX is the best I've ever seen. "Beyond HD" is not an empty marketing phrase. This thing surprised me with its color, clarity, and brightness. It still reflects noticeably, though. Just to test it, I downloaded a movie and WOW!!!! Sound and picture beyond belief!!! Navigation is intuitive and easy. I can quickly and easily switch among reading, watching videos, shopping, and moreMost of the apps I want are available for my HDX. YouTube works just fine on the Silk Browser. And there are plenty of news apps, games, alarm clocks, etc. Seamlessly integrated with all things Amazon. I buy the vast majority of books and movies from Amazon, and my HDX provides an unbeatable way to enjoy them.Looking for a e-reader, tablet that offers great ease-of-use, picture and sound, and, and, and people always complain about support, not that they can solve every problem but at least you can get help. VERY IMPORTANT!!!… Best product on the market. I love mine!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing clarity
Reviews.Author: Gwen Drury
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this is stunning! I am still learning my way on all the features and using trial & error to explore. Having a free trial of Amazon Prime is great, too.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle. I really like this one. It is like a small computer,not just a book reader. I do every thing on it.Most of the time  I don't have  to even get  my lap top out. It's very lightweight and slender. I take it ever where.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Love
Reviews.Author: jane m wolfe
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire! I can take it with me any were and to tell the truth I have. It has great color and I never get any glare from the sun. I tell all my friends that it is a must have.

Reviews.Title: another "hit" for Kindle
Reviews.Author: SMS1253
Reviews.Content: LOVE  the new HDX! User friendly, sound is superior, and price is right.  8.9 in. is perfect size for over 50 crowd. Keeps viewing screen compact but not too small for those of us using readers : ) Another great product in the Kindle line

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. Francisco
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my kindle except that I didn't buy the one that I didn't need Wifi but that was my mistake. I use it several hours a day and LOVE the Mayday feature.  Highly recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: NICE TECHNOLOGY
Reviews.Author: DOUGLAS PETTIT
Reviews.Content: Love ability to go on the net mobile and actually see what is on the screen. Very light and easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire !!!!
Reviews.Author: Lynne
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for about 1 month.  I love it. I have the Amazon Prime and have watched several show/movies and it is great.  I can view my Facebook, email, Pintrest  and more.  I also love the Mayday Option, I always know if I have a problem or question they are always there to help and are very friendly.  Would recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Sherri Larsen "sherrilynl"
Reviews.Content: I love the immersed reading. It has a long battery life and has never frozen on me. The cloud is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: cool device
Reviews.Author: Tia
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I can watch tv and movies, hear music and buy take pictures and video and figuring out the rest of the device I can read and play games on there I am actually hooked

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Lori Turner
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product! Amazing picture and light weight. Easy to navigate and setup was a breeze! You won't go wrong with the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Eleanor Golemo
Reviews.Content: My husband gave it to me for xmas. one of the best gifts I ever received from him. loving my new kindle fire HDX

Reviews.Title: best tablet
Reviews.Author: Lance Zehring
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought for me as a chistmas gift and its the best i've ever used the graphics are fanominal and the sensitivity is the best i have ever seen. I would recomend the tablet for teens and family bother .

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, portable, crisp
Reviews.Author: Danise C. Chester
Reviews.Content: Love it, I'm used to a bigger screen but it's very light and great for travel!! Battery life could be better but I still love it!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: E. Edick
Reviews.Content: crystal clear colors, very light weight ,many fun apps to choose from, videos play smoothly. I only wish the on/off button was on the front.

Reviews.Title: my kindle
Reviews.Author: Damaris Velazquez
Reviews.Content: It's actually pretty cool. I'm able to do practically every thing that I'd do on a desk/lap top... I'm very happy with my kindle

Reviews.Title: Very Handy
Reviews.Author: The Chosen Ones Cs
Reviews.Content: I would have given the HDX 8.9 5 stars except that there are a few little quirks that I have to get used to. For example, there is no way, that I've found, that will allow me to delete multiple emails at once. So I have to delete emails from my mailbox individually.On the positive side...this thing pretty much allows me to take care of my business the same as I would be able to on my laptop. Not to mention, I can read books without having to maintain a paper bookmark...lol. I am even able to participate in online conference calls, which is awesome.Oh, and one more good thing...for those of you that don't have the mobile phone upgrade on your Kindle, if you subscribe to Skype for $2.99 a month, you have a fully functional cell phone that calls Skype numbers and cell numbers and the call quality is very clear.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Judy Koffroth
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet to use for travel. It's lightweight, and has a lot of apps. It was highly recommended by the salesperson.I tried pairing it with my HOTSPOT for secure, online purchases, banking, etc. while traveling only to learn that the devices are not compatible. Had I known this before purchase, I'd have made another choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice device and cheaper than Apple...but
Reviews.Author: Kestrel Hess
Reviews.Content: One would think this should work very much like an Android phone and in many cases it does.  It lacks the support for many of the apps, however, and struggles to be as productive as the iPad for only $100 less.  It sits in between the productivity of the Windows Tablets and the iPads but seems priced more as the more productive Apple.  If you are using just Amazon, great.  It doesn't have Chrome support or any other browser, which has its drawbacks.  Most of the games you enjoy on your phone either need to be re-purchased (inexplicably) or simply aren't supported.  The touch is pretty good though it sometimes runs a bit slow.  It is better than my Windows Venue 8 Pro but less well than the iPad Air (or any of the previous iPads).  Decent device but you might want to save for the iPad which does nearly everything just a little bit better.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: WAB
Reviews.Content: The Fire HDX (mine 64GB, 8.9") is a superb tablet. My first was stolen, and I had no hesitation in choosing the identical unit to replace it. My only suggestion would involve the motion (rotation) sensor. It is far too sensitive. Only the slightest inadvertent rotation will change the portrait/landscape orientation. This was evident in both my units. Live Tech support could only suggest locking in the desired orientation (Options menu). As the Kindle Fire line did not exhibit this behavior, I must assume this was a less than optimal design decision, which hopefully can be corrected in a future software release. That said, everything else is state-of-the-art. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: Mrs Pat McKenny
Reviews.Content: I  just love it.  It is with me at all hours!  The screen is so bright, and it makes reading so enjoyable,  And it is so easy to download other apps.  I had gotten an Apple first, but found that it did not live up to expectations...the technical help, such an integral part of the advertised product, was impossible to reach.  This Mayday button really WORKS!

Reviews.Title: The judge is still out.
Reviews.Author: Robert Ross
Reviews.Content: I picked three stars because this is the first tablet of any sort I have owned, so I have nothing to compare it to. I am used to windows format and no touch screen so that took a bit of getting used to. The best thing so far is the HELP app. The live people have been great and very helpful to a non tech savy old person.

Reviews.Title: flash needed
Reviews.Author: Zach Kroll
Reviews.Content: great tablet, but sometimes if I want to watch something without flash can't play  I can't say enough the great customer service that comes with the kindle.  I would purchase again and do become a prime member if you watch a lot of movies.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: David Barrymore
Reviews.Content: Thank God for Mayday!  As a first time tablet user, I'm at a loss with some of the icons and symbols.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Dana Ray
Reviews.Content: I considered the KF against the ipad and samsung tablet and chose the KF because I am a loyal amazonian and liked the lightness of it. I felt like I was cheating my book library by going through an app on another device. However not being able to change backgrounds/wallpapers, struggling to navigate through and find things, and needing to buy tokens to play within free apps and games is a turnoff. So....it is bigger and lighter than my old KF but I feel the limitations aren't worth the money. I would have been better off with the samsung tablet but hindsight is 20/20. It does serve it's purpose and is still a great reader so if that's all you want to do, go for it! And because I still love Amazon I do think their PRIME movie selection is better than Netflix streaming any day of the week.

Reviews.Title: Never too old to learn.
Reviews.Author: Ruth L. Richards
Reviews.Content: I still have lots to learn, but I'm having fun.  The Mayday feature is great.  I've only used it once so far and was so pleased with the polite helpful person I talked with.  Now I'm writing down things as I go along, so I'm better prepared with my questions.  I'm 74 yrs. old and decided it was time to energize my brain with something new.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: shirlyNoE
Reviews.Content: I thought that the Kindle would act as much like a tablet as an e-reader. That's not quite the case. As an e-reader it is excellent, as a tablet not so much. Many of the Android apps that I expected to be able to use are not available for the Kindle, like YouTube. There are apps that are similar, but not the one you expect. Same for several of the word games I play on my Android phone, not available on Kindle. The other disappointment was my local newspaper. I wanted the whole paper, with the same format. A reviewer posted a reply from the paper regarding the format that said Amazon restricted the way they could submit it. Also, love reading the magazines with the color display, but my favorite ones require you to download an app, and I preferred them to be downloaded instead so I can't get them either.

Reviews.Title: apps suck but reading and picture quality are great!
Reviews.Author: Heather A. Stottlar
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great and has an awesome picture but i cant play my games on it because it is so far behind in updates I'm past the levels it is stuck at. Otherwise it is good for reading and watching a movie. I like shopping on Amazon better on the kindle than on the computer. It has easier ways to view things before putting it in your cart.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with very few exceptions
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: Product screen, speed, and most functionality are great as advertised with small exceptions that perhaps have "work-arounds". The exceptions that I experienced are printing to a Cannon wireless printer and is perhaps more fault of the app rather than the Kindle. But, the unit is advertised as a productivity tool from which you can print. I can't as of yet.Also, I downloaded multiple movies from Amazon Prime. Upon deleting them the last movie would not allow me to delete it in the conventional manner so I re-booted and the screen responded with a question that basically asked if I wanted to restore factory defaults or continue to boot normally. I chose not to restore settings and continued to boot. I later went into the settings screen and found an alternative way to delete the movie without having to resort to losing my personal settings.Other than these issues, I really like and would purchase it again. The live help feature works great with knowledgeable and professional support techs. I perhaps should have asked them to assist me with the two aforementioned issues and still may do so.  I use this product more than I ever thought that I would. My friend has the Apple equivalent and from what I've seen so far, I would choose this Kindle ..hands down ... if I had to make the purchasing choice again.

Reviews.Title: Fast, looks good, but 2 major flaws.
Reviews.Author: Kyle Peterson
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a good product.  The obvious downfalls have been well documented, but I'll say it once again:1. The App availability needs to increase substantially.  Compared to Google Play and the iTunes App Store this doesn't hold a candle.2. FLASH - who doesn't have flash enabled browsers???  Silk is a good browser, but not having access to videos is a huge annoyance.  Side-loading dolphin helps, but then it turns into a preference game - every time you click a link it asks you which browser you want to open it in...Other than that, the performance, the HDX display, the speed of the processor are all improvements over the previous version.  Also the weight is a huge plus - It's so light.This tablet is purely for entertainment purposes.  If you're looking for a tablet to bring to work, as well as read books, watch movies, etc, look to the Nexus 7, Ipad or Samsung Galaxy Tab products.

Reviews.Title: mixed feelings
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The jury is still out. I love the feature of having a live person to help me with questions, don't like the glare when I'm reading from the screen being so shiny. I haven't spent that much time doing other things yet. So as time goes by my rating could change.

Reviews.Title: Amazon fixed problems from the first one they made but they still have some issues with this new one
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I owned the first kindle fire when it came out. It was slow, the touch key pad never typed right and where you plug in for power on the device was poorly designed that it finally detached from the mother board where you could no longer charge it. I believe amazon has fixed those problems with this one. I love the image, the touch screen, the size and it's fast. Things they need to fix is the camera. It says it is a 8 meg pix but my picture come out blurry or poor quality. The footage part comes out ok. The sound on the device could be louder. Also I bought a Fintie cover for my kindle and due to the magnetic for the automatic turn off when you shut the cover, it interrupts the use of the camera. Meaning when you want to use the camera or video there is a picture in the middle of the screen telling you to slide your device up to change the front camera to rear. I talked to someone in technical support and they told me they have had many compliments about the issue and they are trying to resolve an update to fix that problem. That was in December and now it is end of January no updates  yet to fix it. I do like this product and I would recommend to those that want to watch movies, play games read books, and research the net.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Mike Simpson
Reviews.Content: Great product, very worth price.  Have used both kindle and iPad, prefer the kindle for many reasons.  Shipping was fast.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Worth the upgrade
Reviews.Author: Joanne Widmer
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and by far the best! I am a Mac fanatic but couldn't see spending the extra money for an iPad... The Kindle Fire HDX does everything I need it to do and more.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Rodney Lutes
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is everything I thought it would be. Does everything that my wife's I pad does. It is Crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: The best present every
Reviews.Author: Lori L. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I use it everyday and am overjoyed with how easy it was for me to use.  The screen size is perfect for  reading books and checking my e-mails

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Audrey
Reviews.Content: I really like this kindle, makes reading and what ever else I am doing easier. Also my grandkids like it for games or reading. Much loved addition to our household

Reviews.Title: Really Great!
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is so wonderful!  I have the original Kindle Fire, which is also great, but I love having the larger screen, front and rear cameras, amazing picture quality, and of course the much larger capacity!  I have used it with the 4G and also with my smartphone hot spot to connect with Wi-Fi, it works great with both.  It's fun trying out the apps too!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Walter I. Gruer "S. Gruer"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the HDX.  It is lightweight and  easy to use.  The processor is fast.  Because of its size and weight it is very convenient to take anywhere.  I never use my ipad anymore.

Reviews.Title: husband loves it
Reviews.Author: tammy king
Reviews.Content: he is so in love with it that it is his prized possesion and he wont let anyone touch it and will grab it if you even look like you might touch it lolwe loved the offer amazon put out for this that made buying this more affordable to buy...thank you amazon for doing that program

Reviews.Title: Meets ALL expectations
Reviews.Author: Roman Garcia
Reviews.Content: Never been a fan of the Apple products. But this does everything and more that what I expected!!! Great product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" - I Love It...
Reviews.Author: Linda Sue Stinchcomb
Reviews.Content: It does everything that an ipad  can do. It stays charged longer than the Kindle Fire does. I an just enjoying everything about the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". I take it to work with me.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Conrad Kimbrough
Reviews.Content: I don't know what I would do without it. All my friends have a different "fruity" brand.My Kindle will connect to Wi-Fi when theirs won't. It makes them angry that they paid more than I did.The Kindle Fire HDX is easy to use, has all the features that anyone needs. Lots of Apps are available  and are easy to install.This is the best tablet available in my opinion. The graphics are amazing. I plan to order another one in the future for my best friend and future wife. Thank you Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Great hardware, amazon life-style software, a wonderful product
Reviews.Author: Ethan
Reviews.Content: Qualcom 4-core 2.2G CPU, 2560x1600 8.9 inches screen in a tablet, OMG!The design of each hardware component is great, the most beautiful tablet I've ever met.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this after owning several Android tablets, each with th Kindle reading app. The actual Kindle is light years ahead!  I like my Kindle HDX 8.9" so much I have pretty much sidelined my netbook in its favor.  If you love to read and you want to enjoy using the Internet quickly and easily, you'll love this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: really great
Reviews.Author: Mike Binns
Reviews.Content: got and never looked backed the Mayday feature is a fantastic idea used it and got answers fast and a lot of good appsto sink your teeth into I have news movies and weather with me at al times

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Gary D. Church "pawnman"
Reviews.Content: I truly Love my new KJindle Fire HDX. The first plus is the weight of it. It is so much easier to hold and read or whatever you may be doing with it. The screen color is outstanding. My wife has an Ipad Air and my Kindle Fire HDX is lighter and has better color. I occasionally watch short movies and the picture was amazing. I would recommend the Kindle Fire HDX to anyone. Plus, having the Mayday button to use as needed. I used it once and was very impressed as to how quickly my question was addressed and resolved. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a great value and a great product.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet has set a new standard for performance...How do you spell homerun!
Reviews.Author: Patrick J. Schneider "MN_PatS"
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a Kindle Fire HD 8.9" about 12 months ago and was relatively happy with no intention of replacing it.  I decided to take advantage of an offer from Amazon for a 30 day trial period of the new HDX version and I was pleasantly surprised, no I was wowed, with what I've experienced.  To say the processor is fast is an understatement...they should require a pilot's license to run it because it flies.  The graphics are outstanding and the May day help feature really works although I've had only a couple of occasions where I've used it.  I've experienced no lag in responsiveness whatsoever and I'm happy...happy...happy.  I knew I wouldn't be returning it by the end of my first day using it and my only downside is now I have to say goodbye to my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9".

Reviews.Title: The 8.9 HDX - 64 GB - WiFi + Prime Membership
Reviews.Author: Bill Byrum
Reviews.Content: This product is a solid five PLUS Stars in my opinion.I am a Prime member and use my Kindle for multiple reasons including VERY reasonably ($) rented school textbooks, books of interest, free game applications like Candy Crush, and the amazing selection of free movies.The HDX config allows a 30 day time limit of downloadable movies for use for 30 days when I am out of wireless range.Superb real-time assistance is available via the MayDay button feature, so it is a great product even for those with minimal computer use skills.The display quality is far in advance of what can be found on competing tablets.Also I suggest everyone with a Fire visit the site kindlebuffet.com every day to see many free books and one free Fire application per day.

Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: carole
Reviews.Content: In love the new Kindle HDX  8.9".  In have the Kindle HDX and this is much thinner and goes everywhere with me.  In especially love the camera and ease for posting pictures on facebook as I do not have a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: An awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Joyce H. Edwards "gramma25"
Reviews.Content: This my 3rd Kindle - Kindle, Kindle Fire (1st release), Kindle Fire HDX.  I like the size (8.9") and storage (64 GB).  It holds a fantastic amount of books and apps and still responds quickly.  The size is great for reading and viewing videos.  I have Amazon Prime so I occasionally watch TV shows and movies on it but mainly use it for reading.  It was so much cheaper than getting  an Ipad and I can do anything with it that I could do on an Ipad

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for watching movies
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: The clarity of the screen is amazing. So far, I'm enjoying the fire hdx.However, I wish the pages of books flipped as they do on the Kindle app for the ipad.Will follow up with other opinions as I become more familiar with device.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Yet!
Reviews.Author: Katsup92
Reviews.Content: The screen is amazing, the battery life is great even with heavy game usage, and the weight is minimal.  I am so glad I finally picked up the HDX, it's fantastic.  The Mayday button is great and definitely a great feature.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Stanley Pittman
Reviews.Content: Does everything I expected and more. And the live support is amazing. Please keep up the good work.  Thank You.

Reviews.Title: the new kindle hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Bun
Reviews.Content: light and easy to use. take great picture. I love my kindle and will tell friends and family to get one

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: WOW!!  BEST GIFT I EVER GOT!!  I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 !!  IT IS OUTSTANDING, EASY TO USE, AMAZING SOUND, AMAZING COLOR, ALL THE PROGRAMS ARE EXCELLENT!!  IT IS A VERY HANDY SIZE TO CARRY AROUND WHEN ON A TRIP!!  THE MAYDAY FEATURE IS EXCELLENT AND THE PEOPLE THERE THAT HELP YOU ARE SO VERY NICE AND HAVE EXCELLENT HELP!! I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH...HOW AMAZING THIS KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 IS....YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!!  ALL THE FREE PROGRAMS AND GAMES ARE SENSATIONAL!!I ONLY HAVE ONE COMPLAINT...IT DOES NOT HAVE ADOBE FLASH PLAYER...OR ANY FLASH PLAYER!!  I REALLY MISS A FLASH PLAYER FOR MY EMAILS....AS I CAN NOT SEE SOME OF MY EMAILS THAT REQUIRE A FLASH PLAYER (:  !!  THAT IS MY ONLY COMPLAINT!!

Reviews.Title: Mom approved
Reviews.Author: Melinda Bessner
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother who is still getting used to computers (she just got an iPad last year and was still trying to figure that out). Now with the help "mayday" feature, she basically uses that all the time to answer all of her computer questions. The only negative is that the volume and power buttons are on the back and it took some getting used to. (Basically she didn't like that)

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Garen Herd "GLH"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the kindle fire hdx. 8.9 inch is the perfect size. Not too small, but small enough to carry in my bag. Great, clear picture. I really like the brightness adjustment capability and the "May Day" feature. Finding things is a snap. Would highly recommend the kindle fire hdx.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire Ever!
Reviews.Author: scott aldrich
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this g=for me for Christmas and I love it!  I have had a Kindle DX, original Kindle Fire and a Kindle Fire HD 7".  The first HDX was a little glitchy, but after doing a Mayday call and then reporting that the issue did not resolve with resetting the device they sent me a whole new one and it is a dream!  I have only had a small issue with the downloadable Prime movies listed on the device in that some were on the list but could not be downloaded.  When I reported this Amazon was kind enough to rent the ones I wanted to me for free until they can figure out what is causing the issues.  I have never had issues with Amazon, I love Prime and my new Fire HDX is the best ever!The HDX is so light and thin, but still very strong in its construction.  I did decide on the roocase oragami instead of the Amazon version as it is lighter and I really wasn't worried about the slide to take pictures function.  I did find, however, that the roocase functions that way as well purely by accident!  If you have the case open and the cover flipped all of the way over to the back it will turn on the camera automatically if you slide it down just a half inch!  C\Kind of a nice surprise unless you are in the middle of a timed game or something.  I travel for business weekly and the tablet is so easy to hold and read on, or sit down on the airplane tray table in its case and watch a movie or play games.  The display is so awesome even when next to the older Fire HD!  I am so glad that I upgraded and went for the larger memory as well.  I can use it to download even more content at higher quality so that I can enjoy it as it was meant to be enjoyed!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD 4.9
Reviews.Author: Cindy Volgmann
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Kindle to all my friends.  It connects to WI FI effortlessly and quickly.  Color and clarity of the screen is awesome.  I have downloaded dozens of books.  Love the ease of highlighting, looking up words in the dictionary, creating my own collections, syncing with my second kindle and more.  My only issue is that sometimes the books get stuck in the queue and are difficult to open after downloading.  I am very happy with it overall.  I find it comparible to the IPad for a lot less money.  Love the Mayday feature, found techs to be cheery and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I've only had the device for a little over a week, but absolutely love this tablet.  The screen is outstanding and the speed of the processor is outstanding.  Browsing the internet is a breeze and the load speeds I am seeing are as fast as my PC.  Love using Prime to watch shows and movies, and have really been very pleased with all aspects of the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Rob 427
Reviews.Content: This was my Christmas Gift to my Lovely Wife ,she loves to read and Facebook and search the web and is a almost non stop reader she takes it every where she goes ! She Loves it !

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Stanley Pittman
Reviews.Content: Does everything I expected and more. And the live support is amazing. Please keep up the good work.  Thank You.

Reviews.Title: the new kindle hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Bun
Reviews.Content: light and easy to use. take great picture. I love my kindle and will tell friends and family to get one

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: WOW!!  BEST GIFT I EVER GOT!!  I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 !!  IT IS OUTSTANDING, EASY TO USE, AMAZING SOUND, AMAZING COLOR, ALL THE PROGRAMS ARE EXCELLENT!!  IT IS A VERY HANDY SIZE TO CARRY AROUND WHEN ON A TRIP!!  THE MAYDAY FEATURE IS EXCELLENT AND THE PEOPLE THERE THAT HELP YOU ARE SO VERY NICE AND HAVE EXCELLENT HELP!! I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH...HOW AMAZING THIS KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 IS....YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!!  ALL THE FREE PROGRAMS AND GAMES ARE SENSATIONAL!!I ONLY HAVE ONE COMPLAINT...IT DOES NOT HAVE ADOBE FLASH PLAYER...OR ANY FLASH PLAYER!!  I REALLY MISS A FLASH PLAYER FOR MY EMAILS....AS I CAN NOT SEE SOME OF MY EMAILS THAT REQUIRE A FLASH PLAYER (:  !!  THAT IS MY ONLY COMPLAINT!!

Reviews.Title: Mom approved
Reviews.Author: Melinda Bessner
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother who is still getting used to computers (she just got an iPad last year and was still trying to figure that out). Now with the help "mayday" feature, she basically uses that all the time to answer all of her computer questions. The only negative is that the volume and power buttons are on the back and it took some getting used to. (Basically she didn't like that)

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Garen Herd "GLH"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the kindle fire hdx. 8.9 inch is the perfect size. Not too small, but small enough to carry in my bag. Great, clear picture. I really like the brightness adjustment capability and the "May Day" feature. Finding things is a snap. Would highly recommend the kindle fire hdx.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire Ever!
Reviews.Author: scott aldrich
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this g=for me for Christmas and I love it!  I have had a Kindle DX, original Kindle Fire and a Kindle Fire HD 7".  The first HDX was a little glitchy, but after doing a Mayday call and then reporting that the issue did not resolve with resetting the device they sent me a whole new one and it is a dream!  I have only had a small issue with the downloadable Prime movies listed on the device in that some were on the list but could not be downloaded.  When I reported this Amazon was kind enough to rent the ones I wanted to me for free until they can figure out what is causing the issues.  I have never had issues with Amazon, I love Prime and my new Fire HDX is the best ever!The HDX is so light and thin, but still very strong in its construction.  I did decide on the roocase oragami instead of the Amazon version as it is lighter and I really wasn't worried about the slide to take pictures function.  I did find, however, that the roocase functions that way as well purely by accident!  If you have the case open and the cover flipped all of the way over to the back it will turn on the camera automatically if you slide it down just a half inch!  C\Kind of a nice surprise unless you are in the middle of a timed game or something.  I travel for business weekly and the tablet is so easy to hold and read on, or sit down on the airplane tray table in its case and watch a movie or play games.  The display is so awesome even when next to the older Fire HD!  I am so glad that I upgraded and went for the larger memory as well.  I can use it to download even more content at higher quality so that I can enjoy it as it was meant to be enjoyed!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD 4.9
Reviews.Author: Cindy Volgmann
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Kindle to all my friends.  It connects to WI FI effortlessly and quickly.  Color and clarity of the screen is awesome.  I have downloaded dozens of books.  Love the ease of highlighting, looking up words in the dictionary, creating my own collections, syncing with my second kindle and more.  My only issue is that sometimes the books get stuck in the queue and are difficult to open after downloading.  I am very happy with it overall.  I find it comparible to the IPad for a lot less money.  Love the Mayday feature, found techs to be cheery and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I've only had the device for a little over a week, but absolutely love this tablet.  The screen is outstanding and the speed of the processor is outstanding.  Browsing the internet is a breeze and the load speeds I am seeing are as fast as my PC.  Love using Prime to watch shows and movies, and have really been very pleased with all aspects of the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Rob 427
Reviews.Content: This was my Christmas Gift to my Lovely Wife ,she loves to read and Facebook and search the web and is a almost non stop reader she takes it every where she goes ! She Loves it !

Reviews.Title: I only say I like it, because there are a couple of things Wrong with my tablet.
Reviews.Author: TOO MANY DOGS:)
Reviews.Content: I CANNOT GET THE SOUND/SPEAKERS TO WORK. I've TRIED everything I could on my own; THE MAYDAY, AND OF COURSE HE CAN'T HEAR ME.PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE HELP ME WITH THIS PROBLEM.MY 7" Kindle has no problem. ALSO, when I play my Bubble Pop Pymamid game, it runs EXTREMELY SLOW. And a Black Shadow shows up on it when starting it up and changing between levels of the game. I feel like I got a re-furbished one and not a new one.I believe I'm going to have to return it for a replacement, with NO problems.Just tell me how to get the SOUND to work, and the speed of my favorite game up to where it should be.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Helene Kyle
Reviews.Content: I had the earlier Kindle which I loved, but now that I have this larger one, there is no turning back.  The only thing I don't like about it is when I'm reading a book, playing a game, or whatever....it's often hard to get the "home" icon to come up to get back to the main menu.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: stephen stiers
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product do to price for the value, It can do all the things I need it to. And I would recommend it to others

Reviews.Title: Works even better than I expected
Reviews.Author: montanarex
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a computer wizard. This is my first step in a tablet, gradually breaking away from my standard desktop and laptop. We travel a lot and wanted something smaller to do my business things and web surfing. Lugging around a laptop to Mexico is a pain in the butt. This thing is many times faster than any of my pc's and it is pretty easy to get to learn how apps work on a tablet. My wife and I bought another one (heck we both have to have our own) after using the first one and enjoying it so much. I especially like that it comes with speech to text capabilities right out of  the box. The apps that are available make this thing an amazing piece of electronic equipment. Like I said, I'm no pc wizard but I can't find one thing I dislike about this product. Also I only had to use the MAYDAY button a couple times and it worked just as advertised. The help was quick, consise and fast.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire, great
Reviews.Author: KaylaNanna
Reviews.Content: I've had the new kindle fire hdx for two months now and I love it.  I also own a first generation kindle fire.  My first kindle was bought because I love to read. As my eyesight deteriorates I find it easier to read larger print. One of the greatest things about a kindle, no matter which one you own, is you can carry all of your books with you. No worries about storage space. Moving? No shipping.The HDX? Lighter. Camera quality is very good. Game graphics, excellent. My favorite? Having the kindle read to me. Now I can crochet and read (ok listen) at the same time. I can also listen to a book while I'm cooking.Had my granddaughter our yesterday and decided to try the kindle FreeTime.  My granddaughter loves it. She wanted me to give her my old kindle. Now she wants my new one. Well she has a birthday soon. So who knows.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!!
Reviews.Author: wolverine_girl
Reviews.Content: I like this product because it is a lot easier to use than a laptop (to me at least). Also, there are so many fun, new things to discover. I would recommend this for anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Happy with my new kindle
Reviews.Author: randy timbs
Reviews.Content: I wanted this for the larger display and the camera works really well. I am overall very happy with my new kindle and have had no issues moving into it. I also like having the internet available with this kindle.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Erickson
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen on this kindle and the ease of typing because the keyboard is bigger. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen BIZZ
Reviews.Author: Oran
Reviews.Content: Exotic product ... too difficult to use with FAT fingers.  Great battery life ... FOR NOW !  How much will the cost be to replace it, since no user access is available !! ??

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: JACKIE SPEARS
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD, I AM ABLE TO COMPLETE INFO, THAT WILL HELP MY SELF AND MY GRANDDAUGHTER, THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Got to love it
Reviews.Author: Peggy Brennan
Reviews.Content: I am never bored, reading or playing games, what a wonderful, colorful and sharp picture item.  Couldn't have asked for better.

Reviews.Title: I couldnt be happier!
Reviews.Author: riderrick65
Reviews.Content: I self gifted myself with the Kindle Fire this past Christmas after seeing & reading the reviews on it. I am in my late 60's and trying to keep up with the younger crowd and couldn't have picked a better tablet for the money! I find it easy to use and the online support is great! There is so much you can do with this tablet it is unbelievable and I would recommend this Kindle Fire to anyone who is looking for a good inexpensive tablet!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Bernie
Reviews.Content: Absolutely beautiful picture. Even better than expected. Would recommend this item to everybody. I bought it for my wife and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: R. S. Hood "Movie buff"
Reviews.Content: The screen is really sharp, great size, lightweight and responsive. I had to get used to the touch screen as I never used one before, but after a while It's easy to navigate. The help app is awesome and free. Great for watching videos and surfing the net, Check your e-mail on the go.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: rkhjr
Reviews.Content: I purchased this kindle for my wife during Christmas!  She has nothing but good things to say about  it and recommends it highly.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Darlene N. Blacketer
Reviews.Content: The resolution, the size, the colors, everything about it, I love it, love it, love it.  I recommend the kindle to everyone that will listen.

Reviews.Title: best gift in a long time
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my kindle fire HDX 8.9 mine was given to me as a gift for Christmas.  I primarily use mine for reading and web surfing.  Since Christmas I have only had to charge it once and I heavily use it for reading nightly for at least two hours or longer. I am able to dim the screen where it does not effect having light on or off.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Gift
Reviews.Author: Willie Jones
Reviews.Content: This is wife writing review!!!!  Love my new Kindle - does everything I need in just a small package.  Usually take my laptop on trips - but this is my new companion!  Also have the first Kindle Fire which will be going to my daughter!

Reviews.Title: 'nother hit from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Harshjudge
Reviews.Content: Great graphics, easy to to select a wide variety of media. This has become one of my all time favorite devices. And the little girl that responds to your one button request for help, is amazingly helpful. So impressed was I that I bought one as a gift for one who has been struggling with other readers for half a decade. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  has ended the struggle. Another happy reader and researcher thanks to the fiery Kindl;e.

Reviews.Title: Solid tablet
Reviews.Author: WWS the 4th
Reviews.Content: User friendly! I Love the high def screen and the weight of this product. I look forward to future products by amazon.

Reviews.Title: Met all expectations
Reviews.Author: feathers
Reviews.Content: I HAVE HAD THIS FOR ABOUT ONE MONTH, AND IT HAS MET ALL MY EXPECTATIONS.  CRISP CLEAR SCREEN, AND REALLY LIKE THE SPECIAL ORAGOMY (SPELLING) COVER.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little gadget...
Reviews.Author: Zopa
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth Kindle for our family and I have loved them all... I am an avid reader and find that reading with a electronic device has few downsides. I have had a couple of disappointments with the HDX, the first being that it provides no native method to print web pages in general. Also, being a technically oriented type I'm feel that the support for apps is a little thin in the areas of performance and user friendliness. In order to support a tablet like device I think Amazon may need to add a little bandwidth to their  servers and require their app developers to provide more extensive help resources for their work. Overall though (hardware wise) its a beauty and provides a lot of features that top the competition. I recommend it! May the Android OS become available for PC's...

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Howard C. Wasserman
Reviews.Content: This is an extraordinary tablet! It is light in weight, the picture is pristine, and the Dolby stereo is utterly amazing!  Along with the reasonably priced Amazon Prime feature I added, which, in addition to the 2-day, free delivery of Amazon purchases, allows for no-extra-charge borrowing of up to a book a month and no-limit, free streaming of TV & film videos from a large Prime Library, many of which can be downloaded, this device becomes a superb entertainment-and-learning center. An additional enhancement is the cover-stand I purchased for this tablet. It solidly protects the device, serves as an excellent table-stand, and also strongly improves the already dramatically fine, rear-speaker audio by reflecting it to the listener in front.  I had expected to be pleased by each of these purchases, and the reality has exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Super Tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Frisby "Vinshield Viper"
Reviews.Content: Beautifully constructed and very user friendly.  It would have helped if there were a basic user guide included rather than having to call for help each time I got lost during the initial stages of using the tablet.  By the way, the "Mayday" feature is excellent and the techs are very knowledgeable and helpful...the best I have encountered in all my years of messing around with PCs.All in all, a great product...the only thing preventing "5 stars" was the lack of a user guide in the box.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: K B
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my girlfriend this year after owning a 1st Generation Kindle Fire.  The difference is STAGGERING.  The 1st Gen is a really great unit in its own right, but the HDX is leaps and bounds ahead.  The processor is so much faster, the load up for any apps or books is hands down the quickest of anything I've seen (even faster than her Galaxy SIII phone with the non-hd apps) and the display is by far the most amazing I've seen on any tablet or handheld device.  Without a doubt, well worth the money!  So much so, that I'll be upgrading to one in the near future!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great upgrade from my first kindle, easy to use and great from other uses as well. May not need my laptop any longer!

Reviews.Title: Great tool
Reviews.Author: Joseph Waschak
Reviews.Content: Large display!  Finally when I watch TV or download a magazine I don't have to scroll all over, like I do on my smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: ThePeoplesChamp
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Tablet PC. It is very smooth and fast! By far the best Kindle yet. Sturdy built unit and the quad core processor makes for an almost instant no lag program load. Highly recommended! Skype runs smooth as butter. My other tablets did not run skype without using alot of its resources which made video quality poor. Not this unit HD front and back camera's for superior photo and video shots.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift.
Reviews.Author: Leta M. Franklin
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my grown son after he suggested he would like to have same.  He was happy and he is knowledgeable, so I know it measured up to his expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great, but with a dumb calander app
Reviews.Author: Duane W Lundahl
Reviews.Content: Overall great. Light and fast. The device does leave out a pure web experienve since it is so tied to Amazaon but that's minor. My complaint is that the calendar app that is included can't be even used if you have your email account with AOL. That, it appears, is due to the fact that it is not written in a way to allow the calendar app to sync with AOL. I learned this by using the Mayday button and going through about three reps before one that understood the problem could explain it. He stated that you had to have certain email accounts (ie. Gmail, yahoo etc in order for the app to sync.) Why in the world would you write an app like that? He further stated that there were many other calendar apps availabe that did not need to sync with your email. Supposedly that's a satisfactory answer. I think not as it eludes the question of why did you write the software that way? Dumb!By the way, some have written this is an iPad killer. Not in my opinion and I have an iPad.

Reviews.Title: So Glad I Chose THe Fire 8.9"
Reviews.Author: yogatorrie
Reviews.Content: This device is a pleasure to use. It's slim and light weight. I kind of carry it everywhere when I'm home, (sort of like Linus with his blanket from the Snoopy comics). I am not an expert on tablet devices regarding pixels and resolution. I am an expert on what I like and what works for me. Some tech devices that so many of us have made a part of our every day lives make you feel as if you need to take a class at your local community college in order to utilize. Not so with this Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX.I have used the Mayday button feature and It works!The video on this device is beautiful. The screen size is so much better than the smaller screens if you enjoy watching TV shows or movies as much as I like to do.I'm a adult, working outside the home with a family and all that time constraints that come with that life. It's so nice to have my Kindle fire to give me choices when I get some "me time".I am a happy Amazon and Kindle user. I definitely recommend the Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love
Reviews.Author: Paul Diamond "Pablo"
Reviews.Content: I love the screen resolution.I love the battery lifeI love that all my content (books, audio books, magazines, music, video, apps) can be on the device or in the cloud, and its so easy to access them from the cloud.I also have an ipad 2 and a Kindle Fire 8.9 HD. This device is superior to both in every aspect.

Reviews.Title: Overall great product
Reviews.Author: Debbie Nelson
Reviews.Content: I am not sure if it is the device or programs but there have been several times when programs report that it is not connected to the internet when it is.  The device shows it is connected and my other Kindle Fire HD, laptop and desktop all have access to the wireless when this message comes up.  Resetting the device always works but is a bit of a pain.  I wish more Google play apps would run on it as well but over all the app selection is pretty good.  Otherwise everything is awesome.  It is great having the 4g for those times that you want to take it on the road :)  The screen is absolutely amazing!

Reviews.Title: Five Stars
Reviews.Author: Carol Barcomb
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire HDX - I find it very easy to read and the size is just perfect for my needs.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is interested in purchasing this.

Reviews.Title: Great pad
Reviews.Author: Henery
Reviews.Content: It's got everything you would like in a entertainment package plus  help when needed. What more could you ask for!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Charlie in Austin
Reviews.Content: I wanted a very high quality display to show photos...and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 delivers!It's great for viewing movies and reading when I'm traveling.It has a long battery life.Amazon Cloud enables me to store pictures/files on my PC which then can be viewed on the Kindle.I can easily download pictures to the Kindle from Amazon Cloud to view when not connected to the internet.The Mayday HELP capability is GREAT...I've used it several times and got my issues resolved.The customer support is GREAT!

Reviews.Title: symply the best.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: i find the kindle fire hdx8.9 to be the best better than all the rest.this tablet is above all other.

Reviews.Title: Love this size and how light it is
Reviews.Author: Snow-white
Reviews.Content: I already had the Kindle Paperwhite, which used I daily, and I was debating if it would be worth it to also get the Kindle Fire. I bought the Kindle Fire as a gift for my son. While he was home, I was able to see the 8.9" K Fire in action and loved that as a Amazon Prime member I can watch many movies and TV shows for free. I was able to check out reading magazines and cookbooks on the large 8.9" screen which was also a lot of fun. So I went ahead and ordered myself the new Kindle Fire.Now,  I use them both, the Paperwhite and the Fire, - daily. The books are stored in the cloud and available on both devices. When I wake up in the middle of the night and can't go back to sleep, reading on the smaller Paperwhite is the better option, because the light on the paperwhite can really be turned very low and somehow not interfere with my husbands sleep. Also, the Paperwhite fits into the smallest handbags. BUT for reading leisurely on the couch during the day, for watching movies, series ETC.!!! this Kindle Fire is really great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD X 8.9
Reviews.Author: SMITHKEN
Reviews.Content: excellent product excellent service I'm just beginning to understand all that it can do. glad I bought the user guide to go with it

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: weestraw
Reviews.Content: had the 1st generation kindle fire loved that, now i have this 1 & i really love it.  I love the bigger screen, its faster and xtra clear, also my fire didnt have speech to text (or whatever its called), i took the time 2 get email running so now i can send and receive emails, i also changed the name of the kindle from what amazon gave me, and a plus is that all my information from my other kindle is on this 1.  i am glad that i purchased this!!!

Reviews.Title: HDX the best Kindle Fire to Date !!
Reviews.Author: David K.
Reviews.Content: I love the picture quality..... you cant even see the pixels on the 8.9 HDX. Watching movies is the the number one thing for this tablet, along with reading books. For the price.... the Kindle Fire HDX has the Apple I-pad and the Samsung tablet beat hands down. Silk is fast and runs great.
