I get G-mail and YouTube just fine on this tablet, not sure what people are talking about not being able to get gmail and YouTube. I have a Apple I-Pad 2 soooo glad I bought this and saved some money.  I have shone all my friends and they all love it ! Several have since purchased the Fire HDX.....they have yet to be disappointed ! Only thing that really wasn't needed was the 64GB because the Kindle Fire HDX has cloud storage. But what ever ! I have it if I ever need it !

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: don
Reviews.Content: it's great. had my daughter help me set it up as she is very good with tablets. she owns an i pad. the kindle is easy to operate and i  really enjoy using it. my daughter was very impressed with it and thought the price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Really great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Sannes
Reviews.Content: It works great for what i use a tablet for. Great screen, easy to use. I would recommend it highly.Mike

Reviews.Title: Love this.
Reviews.Author: C. Turner
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle and it doesn't disappoint.  Easy to use and beautiful to look at.  I would highly recommend a Kindle for anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Carolyn S. Myers
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly and if I had questions, being able to chat with someone immediately is fantastic.  Walked me through exactly what I need to do.  Recommend to anyone wanting to purchase a tablet.

Reviews.Title: NEW OWNER OF A KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: trini girl
Reviews.Content: Love it, expect i will have it for a very long time. Thanks to amazon payment plan i finally feel i have come into the 21st century. My friends & family  also love the fact they can see me on skype.thanks amazon.

Reviews.Title: Better than the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Stephen Champlin
Reviews.Content: Have used both products, and the HDX is hands down the better tablet!  I would reccomend this product to anyone interested in an awesome tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the machine. I find it very easy once you know what to do. I am still learning about it. I brought books on it.The only thing I didn't like was not receiving an instruction book on it so I could read it first.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and set up, LOVE it so far!
Reviews.Author: Dane P.
Reviews.Content: I was expecting far less. I am surprised. Easy set up out of the box charge it and go. Only problem is fighting with the family over who gets to use it, translation I will end up buying more.....

Reviews.Title: Best one yet
Reviews.Author: kyrhyne
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her HDX.  The only thing that would make it better would be supporting flash and expanding the app store.  Outside of those two things, it's an amazing tablet!

Reviews.Title: Fire 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: papagreg
Reviews.Content: I am blown away by the design and performance of this e-pad.  This is my second, bought the original Fire when it came out a couple years ago.  Looks and feels great, software works fine, quick response for the few things I have used it for so far.  Amazon was also quick to ship and made adjustment to order when I asked for it.  Don't know much about electronics, but I know right now that this will be used 90% of the time for all my web surfing, email reading, taking on vacation, reading books and downloading movies to watch on the road.  Great reader also.  Battery life is good.  Setup is a breeze.  Wireless works great.  Don't know anything about gaming capabilities, look to other reviewers for that.  Pay the $79 per year to become a Prime member to realize the greatest advantages of this unit. The quality of this build is on a par with and maybe better than that red tree fruit that grows in Washington state.  I see some reviews griping about being tied to Amazon, but for my use and needs, that is a plus rather than a minus.  Could go on with praises, but you get the idea.  If you are on the fence and are an average tablet user, get it now.  If you have kids or are clumsy dropping things a lot, get the protective case, otherwise the cheap cover pad will be sufficient.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: S. Schmunk
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. I upgraded from the Kindle Fire HD and it took a little getting used to but now I have figured it out and it is great.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Arthur Byrd
Reviews.Content: I bought  this as a gift for my daughter she is in love with it,. it works very well and she is very happy with her gift

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is awesome, I've moved up from my kindle hd fire to this one and it's awesome. Light, great screen to read on.

Reviews.Title: What a good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Edward Ybarra
Reviews.Content: Spunky, Smart design, Fantastic Graphics! I am so pleased with this new Kindle. I't only needs an SD memory Slot to be incredible.Hint Hint!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Brant Thornton
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Best yet!  Love everything Amazon does - very good products and delivery and this Kindle is no different!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX8.9"
Reviews.Author: honeydew
Reviews.Content: to anyone who has a kindle or a kindle fire, you will love the kindle fire HDX8.9" or the smaller one. I  just love this one. I already have the kindle.which is in black and white. DI loved that one when I got It. My son gave me the kindle fire for Christmas last year.I loved that one even more.it is in color. But the kindle fire HDX8.9" is WOW it is faster,I haven't really played with it much, but what I see of it is awesome. I plan on keeping at least the first kindle because there are some games on there that I can't get on the other kindles. It came already set up for me which I liked.

Reviews.Title: Does what it is supposed to do
Reviews.Author: Stephen "reader of books"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle (my second Kindle Fire).  I find it faster and works more smoothly than the first Kindle fire.  I really like the 8.9 form factor.  The Origami case works pretty well but about doubles the weight it seems.The only thing holding it back from 5 stars is the fact it does not have full access to android store or apps.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!
Reviews.Author: roseyv55
Reviews.Content: First tablet I have ever owned, very light weight, display great. Only wish it would of come with a manual so I could learn to navigate, but am figuring it out. Mayday button is very helpful!

Reviews.Title: happy with it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did lots of research before purchasing this unit.  It seems great for my daughter's use which will be mostly surfing the net, reading books, watching movies etc.  Since it doesn't seem to have full access to the google play apps and some of my work related apps are not silk compatible, it would not be the best choice for me.  But is was a great purchase for what is being used for.

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: lureneh
Reviews.Content: These older eyes really enjoy the bigger screen and the high definition.  There was a problem with the speakers and they had to replace it, but the replacement came quickly and the return was free and effortless.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Jean Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase.  It's fantastic and I use it every day.  I highly recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Crystal Peoples
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I am learning new things about it each day.  Since submitting my initial rating, I have no idea why my reasoning did not show up, but I have learned how to adjust text to speech voice speed.  The other issues I had were the inability to print web pages and the fact that the text to speech tends to stop at the beginning of a new chapter.  The volume is fine indoors but inside of a car, the road sounds tend to make it difficult to hear text to speech unless you have the device in your lap which is risky while driving.  In certain books, text to speech repeats the last word in a sentence.  This can be annoying.  I imagine I use text to speech more than the average person.  Other than my listed issues, I have no problem with the device.  I was told that Amazon is working on web printing and the text to speech new chapter stopping.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Redhot
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet. So glad I chose this one. Lots of apps to pick from. Downloads are quick. Been easy to figure out everything.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael T Iocca
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that someone is able to help you at any time of the day with the May Day button.I love this thing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet - highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet.  Bought the HD 7" in Jan.2013 & there is such a difference between the two. I ordered the 7 HDX 32gb online (not thru Amazon) & the store grabbed the wrong box & I ended up with the 8.9" HDX 32gb, which was even better because I saved myself 200.00 some dollars & got a better tablet.  The 8.9 HDX is very comparitive to the Nexus 10 which is also an excellent tablet, but about a $100.00 less than the 8.9 HDX 32bg.  I may be selling my 7" HD Kindle on ebay & maybe even the Nexus, because the Nexus & 8.9 HDX are the same in all qualities & specifications.  The HDX 8.9 is easy to use, light, good screen quality to watch movies & play games & I especially like the power button.  I recommend this to buy along with the Nexus 10

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Marianne Brown
Reviews.Content: It has a beautiful display.  I really loved it except for the fact that it froze up on me 4 times  in one week.  Also, certain games that I wanted were not formatted yet for the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Super Terrific!!!
Reviews.Author: IJL "IJL"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire and still enjoy all three.  Super products!The newest Kindle Fire  I have is the HDX 8.9" and my others are HD 7" and HD 8.9"; each one has its own selling points and addresses a  variety of people---young, old, computer gurus and not so guru!!  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: A. Scott
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire.  I have each of the other versions (!) and think this one is outstanding.  I love the MayDay button and being able to download TV shows and movies.

Reviews.Title: love all my kindles
Reviews.Author: Carla,
Reviews.Content: I love it,  love how clear the images are.  It does everything I wanted and more. I did not go ad free, they are just fine on opening page only.

Reviews.Title: The Mayday Button
Reviews.Author: OP
Reviews.Content: Have to admit.  The Mayday button raises the bar in great customer service for other companies to aspire to.  A bright idea!

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet, fast, clear, light.  Would be perfect with access to Google Play.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "JKM"
Reviews.Content: I like the clarity and ease of use of this tablet.  It is fast and easy to use.  It is good to hold, light, I almost hated to put a cover on it, so I purchased a more open cover that doesn't detract so much from the tablet itself. The apps are pretty good, and I have found replacements close to those that I enjoy on my other Android tablet.  Of course it is very linked to the Amazon sphere of products.  I wish I had waited to add Amazon Prime, because of the delivery delay from ordering that my one month free trial was almost all used up before I received my tablet so I was not fully able to enjoy on the tablet.  That is why I cancelled Amazon Prime. My main complaint is that I still miss Google Play Store access.

Reviews.Title: love this new kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Constance
Reviews.Content: Perfect size screen and so sharp and easy to read books on. . Not to heavy. Movies look fantastic. Amazon Prime has so many movies and books for me to choose from.....  is a very good value  and with free shipping.... How can you beat this?

Reviews.Title: Excellent  Tablet
Reviews.Author: aml
Reviews.Content: Very quick to load information.  The clarity of the pictures and web information is just unreal.  The ease of using this kindle and the weight for this size of tablet is great. Another great feature is "May Day", which I have used and the tech. support has been great.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: daniel lane
Reviews.Content: I was not sure how much I liked  the Fire at first but after using it for the last two weeks I love it.  It is my first experience with a tablet as i've only used a laptop before. The mayday button is a great feature. Very helpful. I thought at first I would return it  but have decided to keep it. I am very happy with the purchase and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet/ebook.
Reviews.Author: Stephen J. Lemmons "DocTronics"
Reviews.Content: It is outstanding and easy to use no matter if you use it as an ebook or to access the internet and use it as a tablet.  There is one draw back I see a lack of an instruction manual.  It more than justifies the five stars if possible and it needs a sixth star.

Reviews.Title: Love the HDX!
Reviews.Author: djtaylor
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  This is my fourth one.  Started out with the paperwhite which still can't be beat for reading in the sun, helped one of my grandsons have a Kindle Fire by helping him purchase my last one.  Love the lightness of my HDX!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ann Hawley
Reviews.Content: Easty to use - hopefully I will have more time to play with it over the holidays; but I was very satisfied with my decision to purchase the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love how light it is & how quickly it responds. Wish the glass screen didn't show fingerprints, this is my only complaint. Can't imagine using any other tablet. My husband is enjoying my old kindle fire 8.9".

Reviews.Title: Great tablet but......
Reviews.Author: Todd Lee
Reviews.Content: While this tablet is great for most things, it just wasn't right for me. If you need flash player for anything, you will be disappointed. Otherwise, the picture, sound, and everything else works great. I really wish I could have kept it.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Pablo Alfaro Porras
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my new Kindle Fire HDX.  It's very fast and the resolution is great!  New features are amazing!  It is very light to hold.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!
Reviews.Author: LisaLisa
Reviews.Content: I thought long and hard..iPad or Kindle? I decided to purchase the new  Kindle and I am most pleased. I have found some really fun apps and love the built in camera and video. Amazon has much to offer in apps and I just appreciate getting such a great product at such a reasonable price. This is my first tablet and I enjoy it everyday!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Dru
Reviews.Content: Fast, light, responsive and affordable! Comparing to my iPad Air, this device is truly goes head to head with it. I would recommend this to anyone in the market for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Truly An Wonder In Its' Own Right
Reviews.Author: Rockndaddy
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX 8.9 is nothing short of FANTASTIC!!!13.2 ounces with 5.1 dolby audio is amazing !!!The picture is unbelievably sharp and clear sporting an 2560X1600 HDX displaythat has 1080P falling way behind.Office Suite is preloaded so you can keep up with your office work.This little Jewel also has front HD 720 camera and an rear 8MP camera that takes vivid lifelike pictures.The action of the Silk Browser is remarkable and very easy to navigate.There is so much more about the Kindle HDX,free books to borrow from Amazon library, kids games,over 100,000 apps.The 8.9 HDX Kindle does it all.It seems like there is not enough hours in the day to use all the features of this little wonder.Now I am thinking when is Amazon going to give us an Kindle phone?

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Lori Hinkle "Emerald"
Reviews.Content: Overall I love this device. The only bad thing so far is it still won't run Adobe flash player which is a pain. Picture and sound are amazing. The camera is a great addition and takes good quality pics. This is my second kindle fire and I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, can't say more.
Reviews.Author: Sherrie Mccauley "shermorley"
Reviews.Content: I am a kindle junkie, this is my forth Kindle fire, 5 if you count my original kindle. I absolutely love it. Now my son, daughter and granddaughter all have one. I do not leave home without it. I have friends who have the iPad, they've asked about the kindle and I've told them that my fire can do everything their iPad can and It didn't cost me as much. I totally love this thing.

Reviews.Title: Not everything is as advertised
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I used the Amazon trade-in program to purchase the HDX 32 GB (wanted the 64 but it was unavailable).  I had been using the 8.9 Fire HD model and I really loved it.  I decided to upgrade because we are so often away from WiFi and I wanted the 4G LTE model.  The issue for me was that once I received the tablet, it was only then that I was made aware that this tablet will only support 4G not 3G at all(Verizon).  I live in an area with 3G and I travel to remote areas where I am lucky to get even a 3G signal.  I let Amazon know how disappointing this was and they kindly refunded the $100 I paid to get the 4G enabled tablet.  I was grateful but I would not have traded my Fire HD in the first place for just another tablet that was WiFi enabled.  Yes the graphics are better than the old tablet and yes there is now the ability to use Miracast technology so streaming is wireless with the use of a dongle I purchased, but this new tablet has issues.  I am writing this review on my laptop because while trying to type the review on the Kindle, it, for no good reason reloads the web page on which I am attempting to type, requiring me to start the review over and over again.  I fianlly gave up and decided to use my computer instead.  This issue has plagued my tablet since the first time I turned it on.  Generally it is only annoying but when you are typing and you have to begin a long review again, it becomes more than annoying.The books, music and video download with no problems and reading works seamlessly.  I did learn that with 3MG on my wifi I can stream a movie or TV show as long as it isn't in HD.  I will keep the HDX and live with the web page reloading issue but if you already have a Kindle Fire HD I would recommend keeping it.  Mine worked flawlessly 100% of the time.  I agree with some other reviewers that this device was rushed to market before all of the bugs were identified and corrected.  I am hopeful that software updates will remedy what ails my tablet.

Reviews.Title: silk browser ruins this item
Reviews.Author: wsap
Reviews.Content: Wanted to love this gift but the horrible silk browser ruined it for me. I have a first gen kindle fire that I kept, thank goodness. When you can't access sites you have accessed on your other kindle, then you know the browser is horrible. If the browser were up to par, I would have kept it. Returning it and will use my original. Btw got a blue screen today. On a positive note the setup was a breeze. And a weird note, the 8.9 was too big for me.Update 1/4/14: Returned my kindle hdx via ups. Arrived at amazon yesterday and they have already processed my credit. I used my gift card credit on a new pair of shoes. My credit card credit should show by Monday. Thanks amazon for being so quick and efficient. I hope future kindles have a better browser.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for kids...but not yet great.
Reviews.Author: Wilderness "wilderness1111"
Reviews.Content: With the availability of "Kindle Free Time", Amazon is finally recognizing some of the challenges that parents face when buying a device for kids. Unfortunately, they are still a little behind and need to rethink it a bit.It is great to be able to limit the time a kid spends playing apps when he/she could be reading and nice to be able to control the length of time using the tablet per day and control the hours of the day when it can be used. Bravo. Unfortunately, "free time" is designed for kids 8 and under and so much of the functionality of the device is eliminated by running free time. They assume a kid is never going to want to use the camera on the device or listen to music, for example. Access to the internet is blocked and so is access to calendar and address book tools. If a child is 9 and over, there is another level of parental control that allows parents to turn off certain features only--for instance, purchasing, internet browsing and social media. Unfortunately, Amazon fails to recognize that parents might want a means to regulate play time with OLDER kids as well. This method also means that if you are using your own account to provide content to more than one device that everyone will have access to everything on the cloud, whether or not something is age-appropriate.My wishlist of changes:(1) Make a level of "Free Time" for kids 9-14(2) Make it possible to play music from "Free Time" and give selective access to the music cloud.(3) Make it possible to turn on other functional aspects of the device, such as email capability for certain kids.(4) Make it possible to regulate time spent in certain types of apps or to simply lock some apps in favor of others--e.g. if there are educational apps that get the back-seat while game apps are active.

Reviews.Title: Still considering a return
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This purchase has been very frustrating. There are so many things I love about the HDX, but why they won't allow Apps like Google maps, Chrome, Hangouts on the product is driving me crazy. Their replacement apps are terrible and after reading reviews, I've decided to not install any of the mapping apps they have. So I can either have a crippled product that I keep because it is a great Media Tablet, or I return it and get something else. The screen, speed, and price are fantastic, but why oh why did they decide they needed to cripple this product unnecessarily?

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Oh boy, what a dilemma I had in deciding which tablet to give myself for Christmas. The struggle ended when I considered all the latest technology specs of the HDX. I am sooooo happy I chose it. It is slim, light, fast and stunningly vivid! Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Oh boy, what a dilemma I had in deciding which tablet to give myself for Christmas. The struggle ended when I considered all the latest technology specs of the HDX. I am sooooo happy I chose it. It is slim, light, fast and stunningly vivid! Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: The Best Kindle Fire Yet.
Reviews.Author: Ezekiel Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This kindle would be a great gift for all ages, its simplistic and pretty UI is miles better and more refined than the other older versions. This is a very powerful tablet with good cameras for a tablet, Includes a good decently loud stereo speakers. The lack of apps and some ui elements are the only thing holding this back, as well as ui customizations. But you are a huge amazon consumer and already part of the Amazon Ecosystem, i see no reason why you wouldn't fall in love with this tablet.Pros:-Thin and light but NOT cheap feeling (except on the first point made below)-Screen is not too small or too big, i really think they hit the sweet spot on this 8.9'' Display, not a huge reach when you want to reach something in the middle and it allows it to be light enough to hold with one hand for a long time.-Bright Gorgeous Screen with high pixel density and great color accuracy.-Stereo Speakers (although not the loudest but it is just a tablet)-Great specs and Graphics-Simplistic UI good for adults and kids Alike-Good Assortment of free apps and free app of the day is a great idea.-Clever UI additions like swiping out the on screen navigation to get to recent apps, as well as, getting new application suggestions based on what you have already below the app.-Great amazon services and quick customer service even on the mayday. Mayday took me all of 10 to 15 seconds to get a live person pretty much every time.-Probably the best reading experience ive ever had on any tablet, hands down. This integration of the tablet with the reading app is fantastic. Its fast fluid and a pleasure to read with, They really picked apart the experience to make it better in pretty much every way, looking up words,authors, more information on the book as well as text customization's that all actually had a function and weren't too complicated and convoluted.Cons:-Bezel Pressing on the short sides lead to discoloration-The back buttons are a great idea and are implemented well enough this time BUT, they are too recessed into the unit and are hard to find and feel for, I never got used to it.-when lightly pressing on the short sides, the screens light seems to bleed into the display discoloring it. It doesn't burn into the screen, its something i noticed with this unit. My other tablets and phones have never done this.-Lack of Customization's even if you want them or not-Notification bar is full screen and seems like a blown up phone UI- The Soft touch back is a finger print magnet making the device look cheap and requiring regular cleaning and wiping down to make it look good.-Taking apps off the recent Carousel is annoying and tedious requiring a long press and hold then a tap on "Remove from carousel". This needs a faster and more intuitive way of removing them, especially since it gets so populated quickly with nonsense.-Lack of google Apps, and people should be given to choice to download from either the Play store or the Amazon App Store, but having said that, there app store is respectable has come a long way since the original Kindle fire, by a lot. They should give users the choice but obviously giving them incentive to use and buy the apps from the amazon store when they can find it.Basically this Kindle fire tablet is easy to fall in love with when you first pick it up.Any basic computing tasks are completed without a hiccup. Advanced tasks and gaming are also completed without any hiccups and are absolutely gorgeous on this display. Its Simple yet sexy exterior makes you want to pick it up and get enveloped. Although it not perfect it would be a great choice for Adults and kids and Adults who own it and let they're kids play it. There's parental controls and locks making this convenient.I wouldn't have trouble recommending this tablet to anyone looking for a fast simple and intuitive tablet experience, especially for adults. More Tech Savvy people will find this tablet a bit limited in functionality. For them I'd recommend something else.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: James Kight
Reviews.Content: After waiting almost a month to give this as a present, the day finally arrived, Christmas, and the Kindle Fire HDX was a hit with my son. He had no idea that he would be receiving a tablet, and then to get the Ifad killer was too cool.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love to read but hate having books stack up until there is no more room.  since the Kindle first came out I've been immersed in books more than ever.  I am extremely happy that the newest Kindle is so light and has so much more to offer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display
Reviews.Author: bin zheng
Reviews.Content: Best tablet ! BEST DISPLAY ! And Fast! First time post review .Love it .Love Amazon.I think will buy one more .

Reviews.Title: Terrific Tablet
Reviews.Author: De'Angela Thompson
Reviews.Content: This tablet is slim and sleek and easy to use. Even though we already own iPads, this tablet was the top pick in our family. We ended up purchasing one.

Reviews.Title: prefer over my IPad
Reviews.Author: Mindywills "Mindy"
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love it! Crystal clear display, very quick! I will probably sell my IPad and I have been been an IPad & IPhone user for years! I do wish that it had flash, but alas it doesn't.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME !!!
Reviews.Author: Paul J. Rich
Reviews.Content: iPad what ??? This is it...Welcome to the real world of Tablets Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 !!! No GPS ??? Big whop...Fast/great screen/colors galore/features iPad users dream of...And don't get me goin' on the Camera...BIG bang for your buck...Just great..Get one TODAY...

Reviews.Title: What a Difference a Few Inches Make!
Reviews.Author: Bob O.
Reviews.Content: Upgrading from my 7" Kindles (one keyboard, one Fire) to the 8.9" model is like working and living in a 900 sqft space and suddenly moving into a 26,000 sqft mansion.  The almost 3 inch difference in screen size doesn't seem like that much, but everything is bigger, brighter, and more detailed.  Yes, the price about doubles, but the benefits far outweigh that increase.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Crystal Newman
Reviews.Content: I didn't know if I would love this one or not. I got it and opened it and couldn't believe how much lighter this one was. I like the new design and the picture is wonderful on it. I feel in love with this and I glad that I bought it.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: This is everything as advertised. Fast, light, intuitive and sharp. No steep learning curve. The cameras work great front and rear.

Reviews.Title: Loving My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Nancy Kellum
Reviews.Content: I am loving my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.I had pre-ordered it and the wait was well worth it.This is my first tablet.It has been very easy for this grandmother to set up and use.I have been enjoying streaming videoes through Amazon Prime.The picture and sound quality are top notch.My Kindle Fire HDX has also added to my Christmas pleasure.I have downloaded and been playing my Christmas music on it and love the sound quality.I would highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.I am also glad that I went for the larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Wow!  This is nice!
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Lence
Reviews.Content: After reading all the pros and cons of this product I'm glad I chose this one.  Because I was already an Amazon customer I didn't even have to go through all the registering process.  Very easy to set up e-mail and download games and apps.

Reviews.Title: The HDX is a winner!
Reviews.Author: Elliott Black
Reviews.Content: This is the third Kindle I have owned and is by far the best.  The Mayday feature and the 4GLTE puts it over the top.  I do recommend getting the stylus to make it more readily usable.  Also, a protective case is also a must

Reviews.Title: love/hate
Reviews.Author: Teddie Nicole
Reviews.Content: I can't really tell if I love my kindle or hate it. It sometimes has trouble downloading books or music or games even when connected to Wi-Fi but when it does decide to download it downloads really fast. It has some bugs to it. Like sometimes it will freeze for a couple of seconds then start to work but it's easy to over look because when it works it works great. I think once they get the bugs fixed it will be a great tablet to have.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, but needs an included manual.
Reviews.Author: John Shipp
Reviews.Content: Great screen.  Good colors.  Responsive touch screen.  Inclusion of the charger is a marked improvement over the original Kindle Fires which required the user to purchase a separate charger.Really, really, really needs a good user manual.  I believe that a reasonably comprehensive printed manual should have accompanied the Fire HDX.  As an absolute minimum, a comprehensive electronic manual should have been loaded on the Fire HDX prior to delivery to the customer.Pre-delivery Amazon advertising indicated that a capability to print from the Kindle Fire HDX would be available in November.  It is now December and the capability to print material from the Fire HDX is not apparent.  Might be there, but I cannot find it.  Pre-delivery advertising made no mention of having to purchase - at additional cost - an app to get the printing capability.  The advertising made the printing capability sound like something included in a software update.I have become used to the weight of my Kindle ebook reader.  I was surprised that the Kindle Fire HDX is markedly heavier - just did not appreciate what the weight specs really meant.  The polyurethane origami case adds additional weight making hand holding tiresome although the great screen makes reading a book a treat.

Reviews.Title: recommended product
Reviews.Author: Donald keith Jordan
Reviews.Content: It's seems like a great product and Amazon and everyone that works there have always been wonderful and have taken great care of us always.

Reviews.Title: A Powerhouse Tablet Experience
Reviews.Author: Ben Henthorn
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a powerhouse tablet with an amazing screen and tons of content, this is your tablet. The tablet's performance is stellar, I have yet to trip it up with any game or application. Opening applications and switching between them is not just fast, it's nearly instantaneous. The screen is amazing and puts Apple's retina display to shame. Physically the tablet is comfortable to hold, pleasing to the touch, and extremely lightweight, making it very easy to tote around the house for a myriad of uses. The speakers are top notch with crystal clear audio. The optional origami case is very useful for table-top use of the tablet, holding it at a comfortable viewing angle and standing up to repeated pokes and swipes.The OS is very content-centric and responsive with the only major downside being the lack of Google Play store access. I'm a gamer and a lot of new generation games have companion apps that are just not available in the Amazon store. A workaround is to download the .APK and .OBB files of the application and upload them through USB via a PC, but that's a bit more of a pain than it needs to be to get this kind of functionality.Overall it's a great tablet, but the lack of Google Play access is slightly heartbreaking. You can search for your desired apps in the Amazon App store and it will auto-complete your searches like it has your app, only to discover that it's not available through the AA store. It's just kind of funny that it auto-completes your searches anyway. Other than that, a stellar tablet.

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Circe
Reviews.Content: I'm so excited to have the new Fire. I'm learning how to use it and need to figure out a few things. Do wish it came with a primer to learn the basics though and don't want to use Mayday for silly little things that I don't understand. I'm not very tech oriented unfortunately. I'm looking forward to using Skype when I travel and it has a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Insanely light. Love Mayday!
Reviews.Author: Kintan Brahmbhatt "Kintan"
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it except placement of volume buttons.I was blown away by May day. This is the future of customer support!

Reviews.Title: Kindle MIS-Fire
Reviews.Author: Sharon Friedman
Reviews.Content: Think twice before using the installment plan!!I received 2 defective Kindles,and by the time both were returned,the plan had begun charging my credit card in monthly installments. This continued for weeks, long after I had received notices via email that I owed Amazon nothing. If you choose to use this plan, and the tablet needs to be  returned, be prepared for many long conversations with customer service.

Reviews.Title: "Totally Dissapointed"
Reviews.Author: Teresa Weber
Reviews.Content: I just received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 with wi-fi and 4g. Paid a lot but at first look I loved it. Then after trying several attempts to connect the 4g with my Verizon account, Guess what? Verizon does not support the Kindle 8.9 ! Even though this very web page says that the 8.9  is compatible and runs on both AT&T; and Verizon Data Plans. Verizon does not accept it! Very angered and disappointed because I was told by an Amazon Representative that it did work with Verizon . Shame on you guys for advertising it on the 8.9 advertisement page. I am totally returning this device and expect every cent returned to me. Also used the Mayday feature it worked great. Karen a kindle representative was great and Mayday worked as advertised. And yes Karen did acknowledge that the Kindle HDX 8.9 4g is not applicable to Verizon. So there you go. False advertising ? Very Dissapointed.  Danny Weber

Reviews.Title: I hate our two iPad 2s
Reviews.Author: Pedro A. Vera
Reviews.Content: We were early adopters to almost every single Kindle ebook reader, and we picked three of the original Kindle Fire 7" as soon as they were announced. We eventually moved to the 7" HD and last Christmas I got my wife the 8.9" HDX because she wanted a larger screen.Our son had an iPad 2 as a Christmas gift in 2012 and my company issued me a second iPad 2 sometime in 2013. He likes his, but has already gone through one warranty repair for a bad GPU and three insurance claims for cracked screens (Walmart has an amazing warranty extension plus insurance, it's insane). My work iPad 2 hasn't broken yet, mostly because I don't use it. I hate the damn thing. It is slow, it is heavy and it is weird.And my hate for the iPad 2 got worse when I got the 8.9" HDX for my wife because while the screen was smaller, the device practically weights nothing. And the screen is amazing. So I got myself one too.I actually like this thing so much that many times I read with it instead of using my PaperWhite. The PaperWhite is now used mostly when I am out of the house. If I am at home I rotate between the 8.9" HDX and the PaperWhite. It is light enough that I can read or watch movies in bed, something I can't do with the iPad 2.Cons: Very hard to locate the back buttons by feel. In the 7" HD I was used to run my finger along the edge (this is in the dark) until I felt the headphone jack, but now I have to feel for the speaker grille, which tells me if I am holding the device right.  Yes, I could turn on the lights, but the idea is to turn on the device without waking up my wife.Durability: it is too early to tell, but mine has already survived a nasty fall that would had murdered my iPad 2. I had the 8.9" HDX on the holding tray on a treadmill, I knocked it over, it landed on the treadmill track, BANG, it bounced, landed on the hardwood floor, BANG. Not a scratch.Screen: fantastic. Photos look like glossy prints. Video looks incredible, no slowdowns at all. Reading is much more pleasant than on a 7" Kindle Fire (for reading purposes you can't compare the original Fire to any of the e-ink Kindles), and nicer than the 7" Kindle Fire HD (not by much, but it is better). I never play games but my wife seems to spend hours playing games on hers, never a complaint except mine whenever I see a new order for Amazon coins.Chassis: really nice, I like what Amazon did except that they could have added some kind of marking one could use to locate the buttons by touch. The buttons are better placed than on the HD 7". And it weights nothing, it is amazing how light it feels.Software: Not a problem unless you depend on Google-branded apps. If you aren't joined to Google at the hip, then you won't feel much of a difference between this and a pure Android device. You can side load without jail breaking, or you can jail break the device and risk warranty issues later, but that's up to you. I believe that for most people this is very handy, especially if you are a Prime subscriber.Sound: I prefer headphones, but my wife uses hers with the built-in speakers exclusively, and they sound very nice.Value: Even tacking a 2-year square trade warranty+insurance policy, and even taking into account that you won't get Google-branded applications, this is a fantastic deal. I expect to pick up a third one as soon as my son's 7" HD runs out of its warranty extension.

Reviews.Title: Awkward
Reviews.Author: Gustav Ratzenhofer "Gus"
Reviews.Content: Difficult to navigate and very touchy.  Have decided to return it and go back to my abacus. Perhaps a person of need will acquire this used Kindle and find a use for it.

Reviews.Title: Not worth upgrading from Kindle Fire HD 8.9 to HDX
Reviews.Author: Diane Loll
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle fire HD for my son & the HDX for myself. I didn't think the graphics were all that wonderful and side by side the HD looked better. The HDX kept locking up everytime I tried to play a game or watch a movie. I called tech and tech was in the Philippines!  And, she just had me reset the HDX to factory settings.  I did that several times and it still licked up.  I sent it back and bought the Kindle HD and I love it!! Honestly. ..it's just not eorth the extra money.  Id but the Kindle fire HD again and again. And I did! I git one fir my mom and my oldest do as well. That's 4 Kindle Fire HD's to show how much I live it! My mom loves hers and my 13 year old son loves his too. A grest gift fir you and those you live♡

Reviews.Title: make sure you understand the limitations
Reviews.Author: Carl D. Willis-Ford
Reviews.Content: If you've never used another tablet (iPad, Nexus, etc.) before, you may really enjoy the Kindle Fire...the hardware is very good, the display is very nice, and you get Amazon goodness.However -If you're used to one of those other tablets, beware.  First of all, for a premium tablet, the Kindle Fire doesn't have GPS.  Secondly, you are SEVERELY limited in what you can do with this tablet.  Amazon really only wants you to use for reading their books and watching their movies.  They realized that they couldn't sell a tablet without games, so have a limited set of games available.  This is NOT an Android tablet.  Amazon took the Android operating system and seriously customized it, removing the ability to use any browser other than the one they wrote (at least one if not ore generations behind current Chrome, Firefox, or Opera), you can't use the Google Play Store, you have to use Amazon's store, which doesn't have near the variety of apps.All in all, it is disappointing that Amazon advertises this as an iPad competitor, when it is so ridiculously limited.**Update** based on a comment, I will be more accurate and say that you can't run a browser other than Silk without sideloading it...in other words, you cannot download another browser from the Amazon App Store, you have to change a setting to allow loading apps from unknown sources, then load the browser apk file from another website or device...something that many folks that aren't tech-savvy will not want to do.My assessment still stands as-is...great hw (except missing GPS) but overly restrictive, modified OS.**Update** after using it for several months now, I bumped it up to 4 stars because I find that I do very little with it outside of reading and watching videos of my granddaughter.  For that, it is performing admirably.  I don't ask it to do all the things I ask from my iPad, so I shouldn't rate it comparably (even though it is advertised as iPad competition).

Reviews.Title: Frozen Hell
Reviews.Author: Mookie
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle HDX for a month and it froze four times so far.  I have to let it power down since it won't shut off using the off button.  After recharging it, I used the Mayday button and they told me that it may have overheated and that I should do a hard reboot (hold the off button for twenty seconds).  It happened again but figured that it overheated again because the back of the Kindle WAS hot.  The third time, Mayday checked to see if I had the most recent update (I did) so I did the hard reboot and it worked fine.  I decided to do a hard reboot once a week and make sure that it doesn't overheat.  I did the reboot this morning, listened to music from my cloud and then put it down to do other stuff.  Several hours later, I picked it up to play a word search game and it FROZE AGAIN!!!  It had only been on for two minutes and the back was completely cool.  I'm done.

Reviews.Title: Warning: People who know Apple products -- The Kindle Fire is not an Apple iPad replacement.
Reviews.Author: Jason S.
Reviews.Content: Let me get through the good things about the tablet before I go into why I feel when comparing it to any Apple iPad, from generation 1 through the new iPad Air is a comparison not for those that understand what Apple is doing with the iPad and wants to enjoy an Apple product experience.Since I feel these two tablets cannot be compared, I will give a review of the Kindle Fire HDX's features as that is the only level one could possibly compare it to an Apple iPad Air.The Kindle has an unquestionably good resolution screen with a higher PPI than the iPad Air (I will trust both companies on their numbers. As when PPI gets above what Apple calls a retina screen, my peepers cannot tell the difference).  So don't worry about the screen, either tablet presents what is being displayed in a gloriously bright and clear manner.One item that I do wish Apple had included (In an aesthetically pleasant way, of course) is a microSD slot which would allow quick transfers of data without an additional dongle that plugs into the Lightning port.  The kindle provides this out of the box.The OS that is installed on the Kindle is what is irks me the most of all and is the reason I wouldn't suggest the purchase over an iPad Air.  The kindle has an obvious purpose here and it has become overtly advertised with the discounted kindles like the Fire HDX that ruins the feel that you are getting a premium product; "Special Offers!" Once you realize what Amazon's true goal of the Kindle Fire is; to try to sell you more products from Amazon based upon what you do with your tablet, or should I call it their tablet as you are losing your privacy from where you are when you do whatever it is that you do with that* kindle.This is a deal breaker to me as I know how iOS on the iPad Air was designed and who it was designed for; the business sector and Apple users that think like the designers.  The iOS operating system is very detailed about when it is going to provide personally identifiable information to an application regardless of developer (Apple or any other).  Apple also does not let out any applications that attempt to gain user information without absolute transparency and asking first.  This walled garden is something that cannot have a price attached to it.With the Kindle HDX, you are paying for a device that is letting a company know what you are doing with their tablet at all times. When you consider this factor in the pricing hype over the Kindle HDX you would not be alone to wonder what they are paying you to use their tablet over a protected Apple iPad Air. (I cannot stop thinking of this tablet like those free* internet providers that  were around a few years back as well as those companies that used to give you a free computer that used these same targeted advertising techniques Amazon has rediscovered and deployed with the Kindle HDX).I expect Amazon to keep information on what I search their site for and what I purchase from them.  But this is where I feel our relationship should stop.  If you are comfortable with this information keeping aspect of the Kindle Fire and the absence of a large, tested and safe marketplace of applications and add-ons from tripod mounts to microphones to lens attachments and more.  The Kindle Fire HDX might be good for you. Be sure to try one out first at a Best Buy where you can compare it to the iPad Air.I will continue to use my regular Paperwhite Kindle, to read eBooks.  This is one thing the Kindle Fire can't do, surprisingly.  But to get that paper-like look you need an eINK display not a high resolution one like the Kindle Fire HDX and the iPad Air have.For my peace of mind, I am going to return the one I purchased to the store and stomach the slightly higher price of the iPad Air.  At least now I know why I am paying for the product that I will feel is COMPLETELY mine.

Reviews.Title: Only good for kids.  Can't run apps from the Google Store.
Reviews.Author: R. Singer
Reviews.Content: Amazed to learn that Amazon prevents you from loading apps from the Google Store.  To my knowledge, Amazon's are the only Android devices that do that.  Instead, you can only load apps from Amazon.  There are dramatically less apps in Amazon's store than Googles.  All of the business and art apps that I use on my phone are not in the Amazon store.Other than that, this makes a great toy for a kid.  Toy because even the educational app selection is limited.I don't understand why more people aren't complaining about this.  I'm guessing they don't realize what they're missing.

Reviews.Title: OK if you want to live in a walled-in world
Reviews.Author: John L.
Reviews.Content: Ordered this HDX 8.9 for all you've probably read about it's graphics, processing speed, light-weight, cost, etc.The way it's setup and organizes things for you to find are done well enough.The battery held up OK for me. Not great but OK. I spent 3-4 hours exploring the HDX and playing about 15 minutes of video, placed it in sleep mode and let it sit for another couple of hours and the battery was nearly drained. I wouldn't consider that excellent but OK.The wireless connection on my HDX gave out several times. Uncertain as to why as my other wireless devices were working just fine from the same location and only a few feet from the wireless router. I've read other reviews where this was a problem. Perhaps a driver upgrade for the wireless would fix the issue at a later time.For the most part, my HDX lived up to the hype but at the end of the day, I just couldn't justify spending this money on an android device which won't play nice and allow downloading/installing Google apps.Amazon simply doesn't have enough apps to fit my needs and for this reason, I had to reluctantly return it.I've read about ways to circumvent this and get some Google apps installed but it's simply not worth the hassle for me.Seems Google, Apple and Amazon all want people feeding from their trough and their trough only. Can't we all just get along? :)If you primarily live and breathe in the world of Amazon and only need browsing capabilities outside the Amazon world, this might fit your needs. Otherwise, think twice about what apps you may want or need to use and check the Amazon app store.I'm waiting for the next version of the Google Nexus 10 to see what that offers.

Reviews.Title: Bad Kindle Fire HDX --- Amazon Customer Relations having bad day...
Reviews.Author: Hardware4you
Reviews.Content: Purchased two Kindle Fire HDX...the first in November 2013...perfect in every way.  The Second Kindle Fire HDX - 64. Purchased December 15th.  Miles apart from the first one.  The machine locked up X 3 and playing a game, got black screen and nothing worked...Help in start button when game finally reset.  The three times it reset, hard reset from Kindle Fire HDX.  This means reset to Factory Defaults and start over loading apps from the cloud and input of email addresses.  I also noticed that many game apps would try to play automatically without me touching screen.  Amazon does not have a fix for this. My wife's Kindle Fire HDX plays these same games without any problem. Called and emailed Amazon Customer Service, first time ever to be treated rudely.  Spoke with foreign lady with bad English.  The big man in red must have ruined her holiday with a few bags of coal.  Solution without Amazon's help...sending unit back for a refund as defective.  I would have settled for a replacement unit but customer care being nasty took care of that idea.  I now have ordered a Apple Air 128 GB.  Suppose to be here soon.  Amazon usually blows the competition away with helpful customer service.  I have emailed them that Amazon is the best company on earth.  Bad customer service lowers them to the rest of the competition.  Sorry the Kindle Fire HDX 64 did not work correctly.  This was our Kindle number 9 and our first troublemaker.

Reviews.Title: Nice machine, but not for Google users
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Although the specs for this tablet are amazing, it’s NOT for anyone who has themselves integrated with Google (i.e. Gmail, G-cal, G-drive, Hangouts, Google+, Chrome), and probably not the right choice for anyone who likes the way they currently use the internet or their smartphone.  It’s extremely limited unless you got it for reading and watching Amazon content.  You can’t easily use any of the Google things, not even the Chrome browser, so you have to start from scratch.  You can use their e-mail app and calendar to get to Gmail, but if you’re like me and you share calendars with other Gmail users, good luck figuring out how to see those on the Kindle.  I returned it and ordered the LG G Pad 8.3 Google Play Edition so it has straight Android Kit Kat, just like my Nexus 4 phone.  As soon as I logged into Google on the G Pad, it immediately downloaded all the apps that I have on my phone and everything’s ready to go.  I also downloaded the Kindle app and now I can read books just fine.  All my e-books are there waiting for me.  I’m not sure why Amazon made such a great tablet and then restricted it so severely.  It’s a shame, but just not worth the money without access to Google apps.

Reviews.Title: What more could you ask for????
Reviews.Author: joni cohen
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire  HDX 8.9 does everything I wanted it to do AND more !!  Love it . Maybe I'll even do some reading.....

Reviews.Title: Review updated
Reviews.Author: Richard Blake
Reviews.Content: My original review still exists below. It turned out that my first Kindle Fire HDX had a glitch. I used the SOS help on my Kindle and after speaking with a customer service representative for a few minutes a new device was on its way. Now, except for some minor issues which are not necessarily Amazon's fault, I would give an enthusiastic five stars.I've had trouble downloading content several times. The PBS App, which I was looking forward using frequently, is completely unusable.Other things, like being unable to watch "Justified" in Full Screen mode, which means I might as well have a smaller, cheaper tablet. Sometimes it's a pain trying to get controls to appear, especially since you touch or tap different areas on the screen, depending on the program or app running at the time. Sometimes I feel STUPID, while I'm using this SMART Tablet.  I must say that I love the WhisperSync. I read for awhile and then listen to the audiobook which picks up exactly where I left off.  It has a nice browser that I use to check my email at work.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is a Keeper?
Reviews.Author: JRM Book Reviewer "JRM"
Reviews.Content: It's not as exciting as I originally thought.  One issue that irritated me was the fact that on certain screens I couldn't control the font size to my liking.  Also since it's an android device, I thought I could get apps from either Amazon or Google Play.  I couldn't get the same functional bank app that I have on my android phone where I can take pictures of checks for depositing.  The app let's you know that it won't work on Kindle Fire HDX.  Another issue that the help folks couldn't solve was how to use my Holy Bible app that I use on a previous version Kindle on my new Kindle.  Fortunately, I got hold of the author of the app and got instructions that allow me to use the app.  Otherwise, I'd say from the initial turning on, it was very easy to link it to my various e-mail accounts, all my previous Kindle book purchases were readily available for transfer to the new Kindle.  Finally, before resolving the Bible app problem I was going to either return the Kindle or sell it on eBay but now I'm keeping it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, Good Price
Reviews.Author: J. Lukomski
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is a great tablet at a good price.  The sharpness of the display is fantastic and I'm glad that I purchased the larger display.  In the several months I've used it  the tablet has performed flawlessly.  I actually would rate it as a 4.5 instead of just four.  The limitation is that it doesn't support Flash and the number of apps available is still relatively smaller than available to other brands.  Haven't needed to use Help yet but its good to know the service is there.

Reviews.Title: Cautiously optimistic now that I side loaded Google Chrome
Reviews.Author: LLF1020
Reviews.Content: I am a huge fan of the Kindle Fire until I received the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  The Silk browser shuts down and even after Amazon sent me a refurbished unit (Amazon will only give you a refurbished unit even if you only had your unit for two months) I am still experiencing the same problem and have researched and this topic and I am not the only one. I am so disappointed in the Silk Browser. I side loaded Google Chrome last night and cross fingers so far so good.

Reviews.Title: So Glad I bought this!
Reviews.Author: Marsha Goddard
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle Fire is great! I can store multiple books AND play games on this one unit. Only disappointment is in the apps available.

Reviews.Title: Better than an iPad for a lot less
Reviews.Author: Guy W. Shoemaker
Reviews.Content: Good-bye iPad!!  Much stabler, great screen, does everything the iPad did for me plus I can get my subscriptions on a device I actually like.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: lildeb
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  It is small enough to fit anywhere but large enough to play games, enjoy movies and see my e-mail.  As I am getting older i thought a larger tablet was a good idea...I was right.  Will recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Useful for Entertainments and for Traveling
Reviews.Author: beverly cooper
Reviews.Content: More memory for book and music lover.Easy access to email and magazine without problems and sign-inAutomatically download game, music, TV series(other than amazon prime)Clear and cyber screen

Reviews.Title: love it better than Ipad
Reviews.Author: P. NARAYANAN
Reviews.Content: So I'm an apple fan boy, I have an iPad, iPhone, macbook.. I went into Best Buy to buy a iPad mini, then i checked out amazon kindle fire hd.. I was certainly blown up by the product. I know from content perspective, it's not clean as apple store, or fire os is better than ios. But who cares, I get mostly the same contents, and love to read on kindle fire HDX. the best part is the sheer light weight of the device, it is incredibly light. you could certainly hold it with one hand and use it most of the times. The screen resolution is far superior that iPad. So far I have been using it for 2 days, and I love it.  Buy it for 339, you won't be disappointed. It's cheaper than iPad mini. so It's not even that hard.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Dodie
Reviews.Content: I chose only three stars on this device because I have had a few problems with it so far. I need to use the May day soon, haven't really had time. It randomly shuts off or locks up. It does not have to reboot but I still find it somewhat annoying. And the sound is not as good as my old kindle fire hd 7 inch. It's a little hard to hear sometimes. But I do love how the kindle fires are set up. If these problems are fixed, this would be the best tablet ever!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Gerald Lacerda Sr.
Reviews.Content: I like it very much except It needs to let you have access to the Google play store. That would make it perfect. That is the reason I don't buy Apple products. If I buy something you should have no right to control what I put on it. You did not give it to me for free. I can side load some stuff, but the play store won't work due to it being blocked. That is a major drawback. This is my 2nd one and probably my last due to the app issue.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: I rated this product as 5 stars because I can do anything I desire and it is portable.I like (love) this product because of many positive factors.  I can do anything I desire and take it anywhere.  I can read my eBooks' at home, in the car, at school, etc.  I can listen to music, watch TV, watch videos, play games, and utilize apps for other businesses such as Internet programs on my computer and laptop.  It has quick to access technical support at any time with the 'Mayday' button.  My Kindle has access to wireless sites anywhere in my state, country, and the world.  The Kindle Fire HDX is everything I could expect for a portable device.  Therefore, there really is not any reason right now for me to dislike my Kindle.  There is only one negative aspect about my Kindle Fire HDX.  It does not come with any instructions on how to use the Kindle.  I had to buy a manual on how to use the Kindle Fire HDX when I believe it should come with it.  Therefore, I have had to access technical support with the 'Mayday' button constantly!Yes, I would recommend the Kindle Fire HDX to family/friends because of all it can do.  It was less expensive compared to other products similar to the Kindle Fire HDX.  I researched many devices and the Kindle is the best and least expensive device.

Reviews.Title: HD-Xcellence!
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Hopper
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle and then the Kindle Fire and now the HDX.  I have loved all my Amazon products.  The picture and image quality on the HDX is far superior to other devices.  And the integration to all my Amazon products and features is great.Finding new things everyday like the lyrics feature with my music.Way to go Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: Brian Meiers
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 with high expectations.  Having seen and used friends Kindles, I was looking forward to seeing what the HDX had to offer.  I was NOT disappointed.  It has been easy to use, has beautifully clear images and the sound quality is AMAZING.  My family loves this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Daughters gift
Reviews.Author: SJM
Reviews.Content: This serves 2 purposes it gives my daughter a camera and a tablet.  She loves it and is constantly on it.  The set up was very easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: one of the best
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great! It definitely rivals an iPad and has amazing battery life. It looks really good and all around it's definitely with it's price.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Smooth "Smooth"
Reviews.Content: I have the old Kindle reader so since i want to go online and play games an such i decided on the new Kindle HDX. It was a toss up between the Kindle and the Samsung note. The reason being is because i needed my tablet to have a rear camera with a flash....The Kindle won..and I am very very happy with my decision. I even used the "mayday" which is in person help right from the kindle...

Reviews.Title: Surprised!
Reviews.Author: Brizi
Reviews.Content: I wasn't so sure about this at first...then I came across a store demo.  So far so food.  I had a negative visual of what a kindle fire would be like. I pictured the original grandma version.  But I'm quite impressed and surprised.  I was able to view other demos like Samsung and the IPad and it compared quite well.  The Kindle Fire HDX is attractive and efficient.  I Gove it a 4 because even though I bought it, I rather own the Samsung or the IPad and I had no idea that the Kindle FreeTime was a paid subscription although you have a 30 free trial period.  Other brands have similar feature for free.  I bought this for my son because that's what he wanted for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: MY NEW KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I own all the the kindle fire's everyone of them that has came out. The Kindle HDX is far my favorite. LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE it.

Reviews.Title: Got it within 12 hours!
Reviews.Author: Ginger
Reviews.Content: I ordered Kindle Fire XHD 8.9” at about 11PM on Dec 23, the system indicated the item will arrive on Thursday, Dec 26. That’s fine because I ordered it for myself. I didn’t ask for express delivery but Amazon did it. I received 2 packages from Amazon at 11AM on Dec 24, just an hour before my office closed for the holiday. One I knew what it was and the other I didn’t because I didn’t expect to receive the Kindle Fire XHD 8.9” until Dec 26. I opened the package thinking my daughter probable ordered a book from my “Wish List” for me and have it delivered to my office just in time. I was very surprised, amazed and pleased to find the package contained Kindle Fire XHD 8.9”. How did Amazon deliver it within 12 hours! And like many other reviewers I own a few version of kindle; the first generation of Kindle, the Kindle Keyboard, the first generation of Kindle Fire (still functioning perfectly). But reading a lot of reviews, seeing the ads and being a royal customer of Kindle family I have to try the Kindle Fire XHD 8.9”. I can’t give a review about the product yet because it is still in the box but I am impressed with how Amazon can get it to me within 12 hours. My Christmas wish is fulfilled. Thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Content: It will take me a while to get to know my way around on this new instrument but I am enjoying it.

Reviews.Author: R. Lurer
Reviews.Content: No third party apps like ALL my Realtor apps can't be used, can't put Chrome on am Android based tablet meaning no chromecast, otherwise utterly brilliant.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Cate
Reviews.Content: I have tried all of the new kindle fires: new kindle fire hd, kindle fire 7" hdx, and the kindle fire hdx 8.9.  All three of the new kindle fire family are amazing tablets. I picked to keep the kindle hdx 8.9 because it meets more of my needs. Reason one I do online classes so I need large screen to view courses and to view word documents. Reason two I both like reading and watching videos which it is great for both.Theses are reason why I chose the kindle fire hdx 8.9 but all of other kindle fire are wonderful too. But the kindle fire hdx 8.9 is the perfect tablet for me.

Reviews.Title: She Loves It
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife is on her Kindle all the time. The HDX was a birthday/anniversary present and she has been like a little kid waiting for it to arrive.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire Yet
Reviews.Author: Book Lover "Linda"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the originalFire and really have enjoyed using it.  The new HDX is a wonderful tablet and exceeds my expectations.  The camera is great, the videos and movies watched on the Fire have excellent clarity, and the aps available are also good.  I can't say enough about this new Fire and would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for a step above tablet.

Reviews.Title: Best value
Reviews.Author: Arun Dongre
Reviews.Content: After comparing with other tablets chose this for good value. More bang for bucks. Clean looks and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Definite plus upgrade
Reviews.Author: Elda B. Hueth "Erae"
Reviews.Content: Glad we got this.  Someone gave me one for a present a few years ago and about the only thing I did on it was read.  This one has a lot more features and we got two - one for me and one for my husband.  Been having fun with them and still use it for reading also.

Reviews.Content: It's faster and lighter than the previous generation and the power and volume buttons are much more accessible. It also has more RAM which really helps with web pages loading more quickly.

Reviews.Author: Mary E. Collins

Reviews.Title: Great tablet,Auto screen brightness is too sensitive...
Reviews.Author: skyscraper
Reviews.Content: ****Update****:- I analyzed the screen brightness issue/feature. The auto brightness setting is basically too sensitive. It adjusts even if you are indoors and just unknowingly move your hands with respect to the light source. I have increased the rating to 4 stars as I can easily live with this issue. I am taking away a star because of the known rare camera issue when tablet is put in a case (it keeps showing "please slide" message).I am seeing the same issue that is observed by some of the others... My screen brightness auto adjusts for no reason. Not sure if its a hardware or software issue. It would be great if Amazon can clarify. Apart from this issue, this is the best tablet I have worked on so far.

Reviews.Title: love it.

Reviews.Content: This was a surprise gift.  It has all the great features I use and need in this updated Kindle.  It is easy to learn to operate.  Love it!!!

Reviews.Content: Excellent display. Good battery life. Easy to carry around due to its light weight. Response time is rapid. I have had other tablets but this is far away the best.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Like the Fire HD a lot

Reviews.Title: omg!  iT IS FANTASTIC.

Reviews.Content: I never thought I'd stray from Apple products but this tablet has convinced me otherwisegreat display, ease of use, decent battery life, free app every daycan't rave about this more

Reviews.Content: High quality back-ups and enhancing the usability of a gift is a must in my book.I recommend not going for the cheapest support items for a major gift.No corners cut here.  I recommend supporting flexibility and functions.

Reviews.Title: Vastly different than my prior Kindle, which was First Generation model
Reviews.Author: Linda T. Folsom
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to it as this is my first experience with this type of device.  A little disappointed it did not come with any directions other than "connect with wireless".  Quality of screen images is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Debbi "justdebbi"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 to just get the upgraded version because I read a LOT.. I don't really use a lot of the features it offers but I like that I can if I want.. I have the HDX 8.9" and HD 7" and love both of them..

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!

Reviews.Content: I was astounded at the quality of the camera and video!  Also it's very easy to use.. still learning it... Love the mayday app!  Have almost clicked it but just knowing it's there is great!

Reviews.Content: I love the size of this HDX but ....it doesn't have flash there's a lot of thing's I can't watch. With my old fire I didn't have that problem. The color is great when you look at pictures.

Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I like that it was real easy to start using it right out of the box. the game graphics are superb.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY NEW KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Wilson
Reviews.Content: This one is worth the cost and more. Very fast and the graphics are outstanding. So far I have absolutely no complaints. My other Kindle is the Kindle Fire HD,  32 GB and it works just fine but was a little too heavy for my small hands and was getting slow because of all the books I had on it but overall a really good reader. Now I have the best. I can't wait till they release a new Kindle with double the GB's.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Author: Bible Thumper
Reviews.Content: Ok So some say that it is not Good for an office tool. But they must have more demands for there office than I do. Let me say though that the arguments about it not having a good office suite are false. I live by my office suit and I love the one that I have one my Kindle Fire HDX. You can get Polaris Office, King Soft Office and several others that will allow full editing of documents, Spread Sheets and Power Points. No, it is not like Microsoft Office, nor can it be. A tablet of any kind simply does not have the capacity to operate such a monster of a program. But the features and abilities of a good office app on the Kindle are nothing to sneeze at. The idea that the Kindle is a toy is anything but accurate. I have no games or movies on my K.F.HDX and just a few books. It is filled with stuff for work... that is what I got it for. I am able to transfer data back home when I am in Russia, I can do anything I need to in my documents and spreadsheets. Great Map apps, Calendars, Database apps, transfer of old docs to Kindle, Cloud apps, Bible apps, Email, Notebooks, Calculators, unit converters and other office tools, the list goes on and on. The only thing I can figure is that either some people demand more than a man who has an office in the states and has to access it overseas, or they did not spend much time looking for an app that did there job right. Oh, and most of my apps were free.

Reviews.Content: I like the speed in which web pages load as well as the clear, sharp pictures and video. In the classroom my kindle has become an invaluable asset.

Reviews.Content: Crystal clear high resolution display easy to read.....and I read a LOT!  I like the convenience of being able to check email and browse the web as well.

First, the download speed on it was much slower than on my old Kindle.  Second, after spending much time in setting it up, I found a problem with the unit.  I contacted Technical Support who were very good and spent a lot of time trying their best to solve the problem, but they could not.  The conclusion was made that there was a malfunction in the unit.  Therefore, I lost confidence in the product and returned it.

Reviews.Author: Barney GM "barney"
Reviews.Content: It is an good display and is intuitive in use.  A improvement over the Kindle that I had before my wife captured it.

Reviews.Author: Jack Lim
Reviews.Content: I got this a day ago and its switch on and start surfing for books and videos! It logs-on to my home wifi immediately and after input of password, it starts working! Great piece of tablet! Yeah!

Reviews.Author: Susan Burkey
Reviews.Content: i gave as a gift and she love it so much she is no longer using her phone thank you i can Skype her now

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my Fire, HDX.  Had a question when I first got it and had immediate help from Amazon.  The books are a joy to read - so crystal clear - and games and videos are bright and eye-catching.  Had a friend pick it up to take a peek and his first reaction was "Whoa"!  That about says it all.

Reviews.Title: Can't stop using it
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX it is perfect I find i'm reading more and even on the web with it. I can watch movies any where that has wi-fi. It doesn't glare badly at all I just had it outside with me on a beautiful sunny day and it was perfect.

Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use all the capabilities, I love what I've mastered so far. So much easier at times to use rather than pulling out my laptop. I was reading all my Kindle books on my phone and it so much easier to read on the tablet.

Reviews.Content: This is so much lighter than the 1st generation Fire. The screen is bigger but it's lighter! Same apps available, same fast charging, same quality. The only thing I am not sure about is the Silk Browser. Flash does not work with Silk and when available, you are prompted to use an "experimental" player. Some videos just will not play on this format. Too bad. Am hoping they are working on this.

Reviews.Title: Simply Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: As a long time Kindle owner, I looked forward to a larger version for better readability for magazines and maybe videos and I wasn't disappointed.  This size is perfect to hold and read and large enough for watching videos, unbelievably sharp screen, good sound and connects easily to Wifi.. It has a "learning curve" but not too difficult for most, lots of nice features, holds a long charge, camera is useful and O.K. I would have liked a detailed hard copy users manual instead of the quickie "how to charge and turn on" starter guide.  All in all, impressive, awesome and I'm pleased.

Reviews.Content: I got my granddaughter one for Christmas, the 7 inch display, and when I found out what it can do, I had to get one for myself! It is amazing !! I am glad I bought that and not a  different Tablet that cost hundreds more, I think this Kindle holds up to most of the other.

Love to make the print larger,good battery life.

Reviews.Title: i like it

Reviews.Content: Easy to use, reliable and fun. May day is great. Needs improvement in document  and file management to make it a better work tool as well as well entertainment. For dual language users  the inability  to change keyboard language easily I s a drawback. Also should open to more apps such as drop box.

Reviews.Title: fantastic upgrade from the kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: bebop_music "bebop_music"
Reviews.Content: So, I think I've had at least FIVE of the kindle fire offerings, starting with the e-pearl ink reader with the built in key board. I was in grad school and several of my text books where ALREADY in kindle format. Desperate to lighten my book bag by even an ounce, I was the first one in my class to get one. After that, everyone wanted one.Now there's the kindle fire HDX. As I've always been an electronics geek even before there where electronics, no one who knows me is surprised that I buy every new kindle that comes out. I am constantly reading something and this is perfect. Email, social media, books, magazines, apps galore, music, video, pictures, built in camera both front and back, Bluetooth, GPS, have I missed anything? All in something so thin and light, you can get it into your purse with no problems at all. What's not to like. Anyone foolish enough to be on Apple? So sorry for you....

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sweetcheeks "Nana"
Reviews.Content: The video quality is excellent, what a difference between my 8.9 HD and this.  You can do so much more, love the light weight. The front facing camera is a big plus and again, excellent pictures. Amazon has done a excellent job with the upgrades on this kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 was purchased from Amazon last month......
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is everything I've wanted in a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  It is really fast; takes beautiful photos HD, both front and rear shots; I can bring up most things I can on a computer.Things I don't like, that I thought would be on it, are NBA Games, you have to pay for the games you want to watch;I play my family members on Words with Friends and we chat a lot, it sometimes will go into a mode of deleting your chat message, then it automatically switches you to a game you're playing with someone else in the middle of the message, you then have to go back to the one the message was meant for and start typing the message all over again. This Kindle has a chat line you can speak into to send your message, this way it won't self delete.I haven't used it to it's fullest yet but overall I'm very happy with this Kindle.
