Reviews.Author: Timothy G. Blum
Reviews.Content: Great screen, great display, fast, top specs, etc. Works well on Verizon though usually use it on wifi. Only complaint being new to kindle was that I didn't know you were restricted in terms of apps-no Play Store access, and finding/loading apk files is kind of a hassle. Otherwise a great tablet and was top of the tablets available when I bought it (may move to Galaxy Note Pro though for bigger screen although not better resolution so we'll see).

Reviews.Title: I love this play-toy/tool!!!!!

Reviews.Content: I got this Kindle for Christmas from my brother and dad, it was on my wish list but was a pleasant surprise none the less. I already had a first generation Kindle Fire and loved it but wanted the updated version and a larger screen. This Kindle far exceeds my expectations. Love it is right!

Reviews.Title: Great Device

Reviews.Content: I actually like this better than I thought I would.  With my previous Kindle I could only read e-books.  Now I can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Love It So Far

Reviews.Content: My Kindle is so light compared to my previous one and much faster. The size for me is great. Battery life and being able to use while charging is an A+, especially when I am in the middle of a game or reading and I see battery is low, I don't have to stop and wait. I like my Kindle way more than the IPad my husband has. My husband had me order as a gift from him and only had this one a short time and still learning my way around in it. My only complaint and it is not about the Kindle Fire, for the money, it did not come with a case or at least an offer of discount on one.

It just STOPPED WORKING! I put it on the charger and let it charge over night, next morning,  hit the power botton and it still didn't work! I tried holding the botton for 1 min, then 2 min... still didn't turn on. Luckily I still had the receipt (bought it from mejier) and they replaced it:) but seriously, this is the second time I have had a problem with the kindle products. If it happens AGAIN, I will be done purchasing kindle tablets, and all that ish.

Reviews.Title: Great product!

Being able to consult "Mayday" support instantly on my Kindle was probably the biggest selling point steering me to the Kindle Fire HDX.  It is almost too good to be true.  The politeness, expertise, and most of all problem solving of the Mayday personnel has been outstanding.  My consultations have been "user" oriented - no problems with my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: No Library for books
Reviews.Author: Kay Bowling
Reviews.Content: Disappointed that you can't put books into separate Libraries as in the kindle white otherwise quite happyDoes the job

Reviews.Title: HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Janie Hendrix
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE.  BETTER THAN I EXPECTED.  I STILL USE MY KINDLE FIRE, BUT THE HDX IS SO MUCH MORE.  THE QUALITY OF VIEWING IS AWESOME.  SO MUCH BETTER THAN ANYTHING I HAVE SEEN.  WOULD RECOMMEND IT VERY HIGHLY TO EVERYONE.  A MUST HAVE.  WOULD PURCHASE IT AGIAN.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet with excellent screen
Reviews.Author: kunyikun
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet, amazing screen showing quality pictures and movies, speakers are what you expect for the average tablet, otherwise, hardware is close to perfect considering its price. Enhancements i needed most would be support for google apps and the ability to customize the interface or the launcher like the average android os allows.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet I've owned
Reviews.Author: Elio Concepcion
Reviews.Content: I'm totally in love with my Kindle Fire HDX. It's super fast, Web browsing is really smooth the screen is gorgeous. Videos play beautifully and, if you're a Prime member, there's a nice amount of downloadable movies and tv shows. The tablet is really light.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: MRJ
Reviews.Content: The screen colors and clarity are beautiful.  I have read two books so far so I'm learning how to use it.  This is my first tablet that encourages finger prints so it's all new to me.  I purchased it so my wife could read her email on it, and I could take it with me when I travel.  Prime seems like a good thing also.  I'm looking forward to learning how to use it!  Love the battery endurance!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: AnnieMac48
Reviews.Content: This may be the best purchase I've ever made. It is light, colors are great, Amazon is responsible and responsive. I can hardly begin to express my gratitude for Mayday. I almost feel like I could make it now with the user's manual.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: @margaret
Reviews.Content: Love it love it love it love it love it love it love it.  Loooooovvvveeee it. Is all I can say. I don't go anywhere without it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display
Reviews.Author: Russell Johnson
Reviews.Content: My wife had bad eyesight and she had trouble with her old kindle getting the font big enough to see.  She has no problems with larger display.  In short I scored many points with buying this for her plus I got her old kindle.

Reviews.Title: In Love
Reviews.Author: K. Broussard
Reviews.Content: I decided that my older 2012 Kindle Fire HD 7 wasn't big enough for my fast changing school needs.  As technology is progressing, more and more of my classes are offering ebooks or online access to supplemental software/programs.  This semester 2 of my required books were only available as an ebook.  I did purchase them for the Kindle Fire HD 7, but it was a pain to use them.  I had to zoom in and out to see different areas of problems and pages and read ok.  Being accounting themed books, I was doing a lot of zooming and scrolling and shrinking to see the whole problem I needed to do for homework.  This of course took up a lot of time.  I also only got my Kindle in 8gb at the time and I was running out of storage room for items I wanted at all times on my kindle (music, movies, books, etc).  So I decided with my school refund I would apply it towards the Kindle HDX 8.9.What a smart move!  I have only had this 2 days and I am in love.  Even though it is "8.9" inches bigger, it seems to me like double the size.  I can see 1 whole accounting problem on the same page in a font that is easily to read.  Makes my homework much easier to get done.The screen clarity is much clear.  This was not a huge importance to me, but a big plus.  HD movies are crystal clear.  On the Older fire I had the HD movies were a smudge blurry.  In addition, it processes much faster.  I feel like my old kindle fire was "dial up" and this is "cable'.The sound quality is impressive.  I feel like I was sitting in an i max theater watching an episode on prime last night.For the size this is very light.  Yes it weighs a few ounces with the case on than my previous fire, but overall when I hold it in my hand (most likely because of the larger size and more balanced weight) it feels lighter.  I got the Trident case to go with it.  (If you go with that case I do suggest a zippered tablet case in addition just to protect the screen.)The onscreen keyboard is much easier for me to use vs previous model kindle fires I have personally owned.The front and rear cameras are amazing. The rear camera does take some very nice quality photos.  I had a fun time today going around the apt complex snapping various shots.It is very nice we can download some of the prime movies and shows now to watch at a future date when we aren't or may not be connected to the internet (or maybe a really slow connection).I did go ahead and get the 64 gb.  I was going back and forth between the 32 and 64.  But honestly for the $50 difference, I knew I would be happier with 64.  I have many cd's and movies that I purchased.  I travel via train and plane often so like to load the kindle up with enough movies/music for the trip.  My parents are 7 hours away, so depending on what deals I get, I either fly or take amtrak.  It's nice to have the room to put enough entertainment onto the kindle for the trip.  My grandparent's don't have decent internet (they are still dial up) so I put enough for the length of my trip when I travel to them.  And with technology going towards e books I do have the room to put all my school books on there.I am not disappointing with my purchase at all.  When I have more funds I will be ordering a second for my roommate. She was eying one long before I gave it though.  Just made it into PTK (International Honor Society for 2 year colleges) and she got me a nice gift when I got into PTK, so I figured would be well worth a gift for her.  This would make a very nice gift for a graduating high school student or someone in college.  Like I said, technology for college is going towards all electronic.  All of my classes had e book options this semester...but 2 classes I could only get e books.  I am going to rent the e book for the other 2 classes just so I don't have to lug heavy books to/from school any more.The only one downside I want to share is Amazon put the $500 charge on my account as a "hold" and then charged again when shipped.  I was a little upset by this as I"m still 2 days later waiting for that "hold" to clear.  I have ordered hundred of times off of amazon over several years and never has this happened.  So be aware this may happen to you.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharron Bugbee
Reviews.Content: I am amazed with my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I like to Skype with my family and the Cameras on this Kindle are of better quality than the webcam on my laptop.  Way to go Amazon!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed on how light weight it is for its size. The display is bright and crisp. No problem surfing the web at home or at hot spots. I haven't noticed any lagging with apps. I let my 14 year old use it to read. And I like that I can manage the time he spends on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: M. Auger "TechPerson52"
Reviews.Content: The Fire HDX 8.9 is the perfect size and weight. It does everything that the Droid line can do. It is not difficult to operate. The screen is very clear and precise. Best of all devices I use. I use an iPad Air and can tell you I much prefer the HDX. the HDX has a better screen, it is lighter, and operates much faster. It has all the Apps I use with Droid and the iPad. I would definitely purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: Great addition to the tech devices
Reviews.Author: Carol A. Nahm
Reviews.Content: Great colors & versitility. Love the mayday support. Would recommend it to anyone. Children and adults love using all the applications.

Reviews.Title: my new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kim G "kim"
Reviews.Content: over all I'm Happy with my new bigger Kindle, went on a trip-downloaded 2 movies to watch. Watched 1 on way to destination..was wonderful! On the way home I could NOT get the Kindle to play the 2nd movie, I couldn't even get it to play the 1st movie again.! aarrghhh!!  I have a cover that has a hole for the camera lens so I do not have to take the Kindle out of the case to take a picture, but everytime I take a picture I get this notice that I must lift Kindle out of case to take a picture, and this "box" will not go away, so I have to take a picture with it in the middle of my sight. The picture comes out without that box..but it is very irritating, I tried to use "Mayday" to tell them all of the above, but only got in about 5 mins and got cut off, (I have very good internet service) I tried two more times and it just said I could not connect ?!?!  The Kindle also died for 2 days, don't know what happend, I put it on the charger and left it for 3 days, Now it works fine..?!?  I guess it sounds like I'M not happy with the Kindle, but overall I do like it, just some bugs.

Reviews.Title: Gift for Husband
Reviews.Author: kyshel
Reviews.Content: My husband travels alot and this new toy is making him very happy.  I'm looking forward to trying it this weekend when we go to Paris.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Big Aunt Sal "samc"
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire--which I loved but the HDX wowed me.  The display and new features are wonderful. Since it is lighter than my first Kindle, it is very comfortable to use for longer periods.

Reviews.Title: Replaced old tablet with this one.
Reviews.Author: P. Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I am still not proficient on all the aspects on this tablet, but enjoy the high definition screen.  I use it mainly to check news websites, the weather, to check my email and read books downloaded on the device.

Reviews.Title: love me some kindle!
Reviews.Author: mary hewitt
Reviews.Content: I adore my newest kindle! I started with the original kindle, upgraded to the kindle fire,and now am loving my new kindle fire hdx 8.9! With each upgrade I can't imagine anything more! I've even made recommendations to my friends who are now kindle lovers too! Woo hoo!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth  Follis
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire is amazing.  I got it mainly to read books, but have found many other uses for it.  I plan to take it on an upcoming plane trip and watch a movie during the flight.  It's wonderful.  I have used the help button several times and the person answered my questions every time.  The people who answer the help feature are so nice, patient, and very knowledgeable. I would recommend this to anyone who is shopping for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Nancy L. Eberhardt "Nancy L"
Reviews.Content: Love the size and all the features it has on it. It did take my 11 year old granddaughter to help me set it up but I really love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Steven Reimel
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  The picture and sound are superb and there are lots of great free apps.  And since I am an Amazon Prime member I get lots of free programming and video.  I couldn't be happier with my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great Device, Software Choices Restricted
Reviews.Author: rs
Reviews.Content: Wonderful screen, fast, etc. Sadly, there's no browser alternative to Silk. Silk just doesn't work well with some sites. Unless you jailbreak your device and void your warranty, you are stuck with what Amazon allows you to load through their store. Lots of apps on the Market, some of which I use almost daily on other devices are just not allowed for this device. Overall I'm not disappointed with the device itself, but am impatient with the iDevice approach to regulating apps. If I wanted that, I would have bought an iPad. My bad for not doing more research on this aspect of using the Fire.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it!
Reviews.Author: W McMamn
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". Color and graphics are soooooo clear. Having fun taking pictures with the camera and playing games is a blast!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: g.Johnson
Reviews.Content: I loved the kindle fire hdx 8.9 the interface is very smooth and the system is easy to follow.XIII

Reviews.Title: you can take my Kindle when you pry it from my cold, dead hand!
Reviews.Author: The Kool-Aid Mom
Reviews.Content: This small, lightweight electronic has quickly became a part of my hand. There are so many free apps, that I've still not used all of my 500 free coins. The web app is fairly fast, the movies and shows stream quite well with very little, if any, buffering. The actual book part of my Kindle I claimed to buy it for... lol... is good, but I don't use it as much as I originally thought I would. The sound is fantastic, as is the picture. The only complaints I could have, and they are minor, are: the Facebook app is slow and annoying, some of my apps don't "connect" to the internet right, and my Kindle books and the audio synced and worked together (played the audio while reading the page) the first time but hasn't since. I haven't used the May day feature, either. Overall, though, an awesome product!

Reviews.Title: extrenely WOW
Reviews.Author: Evangelist Dr. Wilmoth
Reviews.Content: The quality and performance of the device is perfect. Apps are abundant, the live help is fabulous. We are still having a bit of a learning curve on how to find a good video player to play free movies, or watch TV. The battery last a long time which is very good, but the little 9W charger takes up to 10 hours to fully charge it if you don't completely power down. The HDX Display is amazing!  My wife is thrilled with it. We do not have a case that fits it well so the buttons and cameras are available while inside the case. We had to modify it. Over all I give it a 5 star purchase!

Reviews.Title: would recommend
Reviews.Author: Mimi
Reviews.Content: Clear,crisp picture.  Easy to use.  Lighweight and easy to move from room to room.  Would recommend getting a protective cover, which can be found at a department store.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDS 8.9"
Reviews.Author: arkansassy
Reviews.Content: I love the graphics.  The picture resolution is awesome.  However, I have deducted a star for two reasons.  I cannot share my MP3 music with my child's profile.  Also, I am greatly disappointed that I am unable to use an HDMI cable to mirror to my Kindle 8.9 with my HDTV television.  I could purchase a dongle but the resolution for my current HDTV I have would be of poor quality.  I would have to purchase another Miracast television if I am understanding this technology correctly in order to have adequate resolution.

Reviews.Title: HOW TO USE A NEW KINDLE
Reviews.Author: SCARLET
Reviews.Content: Just getting use to it. I m still having a little trouble with the added features. I have one of the first kindles and loved it except it had no lite.

Reviews.Title: I'm impressed
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My first kindle. Very easy to use and so handy to find books that you really want to read. All the features are excellent and easy to use. I'm 63 years old and this almost makes  me feel as technologically advanced as my grandchildren

Reviews.Title: The Best Yet
Reviews.Author: JFS
Reviews.Content: A superior product in every way! The color is excellent . Could use a little more instructions for the first timer.

Reviews.Title: Neat
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: Really like my new Kindle.  Am a senior citizen so takes me a while to learn something like this.  But am getting the hangof what I bought it for.  Which is to mainly play games.  As not good to do on computer.  Also great that if I need helpit is right at the touch of a button.

Reviews.Title: great reader plus vidio and instant help
Reviews.Author: Jay C Fry
Reviews.Content: My daughter's a special Education teacher. She recommend It  for ease of use; once I learn where to find all the features. I would prefer a guide book then going online, but I am getting use to a live person to help, then researching a book. I also don't have to wait for my granddaughter to show me how to find things, which she loves to do.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Lively
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to use and I was able to transfer the books from mymold kindle.  I'mglad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: I am still working on getting it set up.
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I love the Mayday button, she is so helpful and friendly and available.  I do have some things to consult with her about yet.She is fast becoming my New Best Friend.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Lillian Black
Reviews.Content: This tablet does just about everything that a computer does.  I just love it.  I AM STILL LEARNING A LOT OF  FEATURES BUT IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS SOMEONE IS ALWAYS THERE FOR YOU. A MUST HAVE.

Reviews.Title: zinio anyone??
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Monet "Becca"
Reviews.Content: I would rate my fire HDX 5 stars if I could get the zinio app on here. That has been my biggest disappointment.  If anyone has been successful sideloading this app I would love to hear :)Picture quality is wonderful.  Love watching House of Cards on my fire.Feedly app works nicely, as does evernote which is my most used app.  I can pull my recipes up in evernote, stand my kindle on the counter and bake/cook dinner. I have been able to convert much of my iTunes library to Amazon's format and listen to my music as well.

Reviews.Title: Love my HDX
Reviews.Author: B. Clark
Reviews.Content: I have owned 3 kindles now...so happy I upgraded to the new HDX 8.9.  It is so clear, fast and light.  Just love using it!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY THIRD KINDLE. LOVE WORKING WITH AMAZON. I HAVE TRIED THE APPLE IPAD AND RETURNED IT, BECAUSE CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS LACKING IN MANY WAYS.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Christine Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I use to own a the first kindle that came out, and I must say compare it to the kindle fire, the kindle fire is the best tablet that I have. I love the 8.9 screen it is like wow this is big and a very nice picture.But all and all I would tell any of my friends that the kindle fire is the best purchase for there money.

Reviews.Title: I am  a great fan of kindle and so there are no disputes on them we have 3 in our home !
Reviews.Author: Dr Carmen Otalora
Reviews.Content: I am  a great fan of kindle and so there are no disputes on them we have 3 in our home !, my grand children love their games I love my books and I can go from down stairs to up without my kindle because it syncronizes  my books pages it is great!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: L. Buechler
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife for Christmas and she doesn't put it down - which is a problem b/c I'd like to play with it too!  Excellent product and it works like a charm.  Best display screen I think I've seen.  This is the third Kindle product I've ordered.

Reviews.Title: love my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Avid Redhead Reader
Reviews.Content: Clear, easy to read and handle, fits in most purses, great pictures! Wish I had received sooner. Thanks to hubby

Reviews.Title: It's Great
Reviews.Author: TM
Reviews.Content: I really looked around and considered several tablets. After speaking to several people I got the Kindle.I am very happy with it. It is fast, reliable and the picture is awesome.

Reviews.Title: A Pleased User
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: My only problem with my new Kindle is that it is a little too big for my purse.  However my Kindle Touch goes with me easily, and I have something to look forward to when I come home.  I use my Amazon Prime movies on the Kindle Fire while I'm exercising, and it makes the workout go much more quickly.  When I travel with a friend, I can use my Kindle Fire when there is only one tv for us to share.  It is very convenient to check my email, and the picture quality is exceptional.  I haven't used all of the features, for example the camera.  I don't skype, and I haven't had a reason to take pictures on the kindle.  I did try it out, and it worked.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Karen Battista
Reviews.Content: There are so many things you can do with this Kindle and the viewing quality is great.  My only problem is that I want to spend too much time on it!  Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Suki Stevens
Reviews.Content: Can't stop my grand-daughter from playing her games! And for me beats going to the library some of time. I'd recommend this device to all my family and friends. Thanks Amazon!!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to learn
Reviews.Author: Diane Ezero
Reviews.Content: Lovw the Kindle fire HDX.  Very easy to learn and of course the new feature of the help person is very nice....

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Rader
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". It is fast and efficient for downloading e-books from the library using Overdrive. The internet browser works well, and I was able to integrate my personal e-mail seamlessly. My only serious complaint is the lack of a user manual, or where to get it. It is a very complex little machine, and I've gotten my tips from my son, who has a smaller version of the same Kindle Fire HDX. But I would like an on-line manual available on the unit, to do small things like removing an icon from the display.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product.
Reviews.Author: E. Longstreath "grandma of 13"
Reviews.Content: My Kindle HDX 8.9  is my favorite device.  It goes everywhere with me.  Anything I can do on a laptop, I can accomplish on my kindle.

Reviews.Title: my new tablet
Reviews.Author: Klaus D. Kracht
Reviews.Content: very nice compact unit,easy to use, quick access.need to become more conversant with its use to comment further at a future date

Reviews.Title: NICE TABLET
Reviews.Author: Xin Liang
Reviews.Content: The delivery was so fast. This is a nice tablet especially because of the high definition of the screen. I'm really into it. However, it does not last as long as iPad Air in terms of the battery. Anyway, I'm still recommending it to you because overall it is still fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Reading a book?  This goes UP so many levels...
Reviews.Author: Michelangelo Jack
Reviews.Content: From the moment I recharged this amazingly slim e-tablet and switched iton, I was impressed with the brilliant colours and clarity of the screen.  Soeasy to Register, adjust the date/time zone and load up the Flightradar24program, up and running within a very short time.  Downloaded a book frommy computer main Kindle Library in seconds, no fuss and now reading abook just got that so much more exciting, all over again.  Thanks Amazon.From time of order, it was in my hands in New Zealand in three days.Now, I wonder why I cannot order the protection cover/case?  For some reasonAmazon will not ship to NZ?  What is that about?

Reviews.Title: From laptops and hard back books, to HDX!
Reviews.Author: buckIinTX
Reviews.Content: I was totally against owning a tablet until I used a friend's kindle. After that, I had to own one. The rest is history! Great investment.

Reviews.Title: Wow! What a Kindle
Reviews.Author: David J. Crosby
Reviews.Content: This thing is really something. I think I like this one better than my old keyboard kindle, which is still holding my 90 some books. it is without a doubt far better than my HD which did not perform that well on a cruise in Australia.  The video is incredible and the speed is up way there.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: newmom15
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire is great. Light weight and bright screen! Battery holds charge and last long. Would definitely recommend it to others!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Diane M. Davis
Reviews.Content: Was exactly what I wanted and the price was well worth it, it opened a whole new world for me

Reviews.Title: purchased for my wife as a valentines present
Reviews.Author: Pistol Pete
Reviews.Content: it is registered in her name now.  She loves it.  Only problem is, she had games on my kindle firethat were keeping score in my name, and when she registered her new HDX she had to startall over again.

Reviews.Title: Much better than the Nook!
Reviews.Author: scrappin mom
Reviews.Content: I bought a Nook and had it about a week before I took it back and switched to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. So much better! I love having the camera and love how easy to use it is. I also love being able to purchase Kindle books. I also purchased a case w/keyboard and use it for taking notes in my grad classes. Would definitely recommend this product. Loving my Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Pros and cons
Reviews.Author: auntbea
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire hdx is as easy to use as the kindle fire but I miss the charging light. The on/off switch is in the wrong place unable to easily use it while it is a tablet cover.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Rudy Tancredi
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle it is easy to use and fits well in my hands. I have also received great assitance from the help feature this isa graet device

Reviews.Title: fast
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this device for xmas for my wife and she loves it.  Fast processors, with great screen.  She loves it as is, but in my opinion there should be expansion port allowing the user to expand or swap storage.  Speakers should be forward firing.

Reviews.Title: love love!!!
Reviews.Author: aei
Reviews.Content: I love it!!!  I would have given five stars except I can't view videos on Facebook or play some games as the flash player doesn't have a download for kindle.  I am going to research to see if there's some way to get around this issue.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: catherine
Reviews.Content: It does all expected.  It is very lite and easy to use.  Everyday I learn a little more on this kindle.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Deacon Pete
Reviews.Content: This thing is miles ahead of my old 7" Kindle fire. Features, display, everything. All of the things that I was frustrated with in my old Fire seem to have been corrected or improved upon. This is my third kindle (keyboard, 7" Fire, and 8.9 HDX) and it is by far the best device I've found for reading and watching movies and show on. The display is outstanding and the sound is great. I love this thing!

Reviews.Title: Have you ever wondered measured diagonally before?
Reviews.Author: Xeentash631
Reviews.Content: Have you ever wondered how "measured diagonally'" cheats you out of screen size sooo very much on all TV's moniters and laptops these days? Screens are getting wider and wider all the time so how many of us play a video game or watch a movie or even read a book diagonally these days? the wider the screen the shorter the height and what you see in the middle of the screen is usually where the action is so 8'9" isnt really your viewing screen in any logical direction you see a picture especially in TVs where you look at the picture in landscape so a so called picture is only about 20 inches tall if they say it 27. Think about how rich they're getting and how we get less and less screen to play video games or watch a movie every year. Your getting 20 inches tall thats how big a 27 inch TV is. Just think about it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Rodney J. Sweitzer
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle and loved each one. Started years ago with the reader and as the technology increased, I upgraded. This one will last a long time as it has so much more. Very good product.

Reviews.Title: Happy is the only way to say it!
Reviews.Author: Maxine O'neil "Maxine O'Neil"
Reviews.Content: A good friend at the time when all your other friends are either asleep or otherwise engaged.  I give it a big Harrah!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Susie/Sam
Reviews.Content: I have another Kindle but I just love this one. I have read a couple books on it. Have so much more to learn about it and other features but am learning a little at a time.

Reviews.Title: Love is here
Reviews.Author: plowwife
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the larger screen. It makes is easier to read. the grandkids like the screen for watching movies. My books travel with me in a compact form. I can take more then I could with paper backs. Since this is the 5th Kindle I own, I think you can truly say, I love the kindle family. Look forward to seeing what you do next

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: ASQ "happily retired"
Reviews.Content: When I bought this, I got the bigger memory, but with the cloud available, I don't think I needed it.  It is a mainstay for me now.  Although I don't read books on it very much (I also have a Kindle touch), I like the games and internet capabilities.  It is also light and not bulky, so it will be wonderful when I'm on a trip.

Reviews.Title: The Best Kindle Ever!
Reviews.Author: Frances L. Williams "Frankie"
Reviews.Content: I have been a Kindle user since their inception. I ordered both the HD and the HDX 8.9. The screen on the HDX is brilliant and bright. I love that I don't need a book light to read it. It is light and easy to hold. I use it mainly for reading and checking e-mail since the Amazon App store doesn't offer very much. This is a must buy if you like to read.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Donoho
Reviews.Content: Already had a laptop which i love . But i absolutely love the convenience of a handheld tablet . With two kids aged 18 mos & 4 years it is so easy to carry my Kindle in my purse for mine or the 4 yr olds entertainment .

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindles!
Reviews.Author: Martha Oppel
Reviews.Content: I've had Kindles for years.  I keep upgrading.  I love this one.  It feels good in my hand and the screen is great!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product with a few misses
Reviews.Author: JasonM "JasonM"
Reviews.Content: First off, I do love this product and would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet.Like many, I was at a crossroads between an iPad, Android, and Kindle. I chose this product based on its overall value and offering. The screen is incredible and the OS is smooth. The origami case is rugged and meets my needs perfectly. In addition to the features you would expect from a android based tablet, the experience is overhauled if you have an amazon prime membership. The ability to download and watch movies off wi-fi and borrow books is fantastic.Only con I can point out on this product is that although it does have an android based OS there are still many apps that are not available for download on the device that you would find in the google play store. I feel that is something that will hopefully change in the near future.If your're on the fence and intend to use this product for reading and/or have an amazon prime membership at all I would highly recommend it over any other device

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Dale deWolf
Reviews.Content: Very nice tablet with many great features. I Like it better than my Ipad.  Graphics are incredible and the ease of use makes this a keeper

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: fabio
Reviews.Content: It is the best tablet right now ont he market. I can appreciate many good things: sound, resolution of the screen, powerful processor, mayday button, battery life, front facing camera, rear facing camera.The customer's  service is the best of the world.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade
Reviews.Author: James Bennett "Second star to the right, and ...
Reviews.Content: I just got this a few days ago, and we already love it. I had bought my wife a Kindle Fire 7" when they came out, and we liked that one as well, and still use it. This one is nice because it adds so much to the tablet. The camera feature is what we like the most so far. My boys like it because of the size and the games. They play different versions of Angry Birds on it, mostly Star Wars Angry Birds II. The processor is a lot faster as well, which is great for streaming videos on Netflix and Amazon Prime.**Update** We've had it now for 2 months and still love it. My wife was jealous because I had this one and she still had the first generation 7". Well now she can have her own as we bought another HDX 8.9", and we will let our oldest boy have the old one. I just can't say about these Kindles, Amazon really did a great job with them, and the customer service with them is great, whether it is the "mayday" service or talking to someone on the phone. I have not had a rude conversation with any Amazon rep since I started shopping here in 2004, they have always been really helpful.

Reviews.Title: Enjoy getting free books with prime

Reviews.Content: I like having two tablets.  I use one during the day more than the other which I use more at night.I could not get my local TV news but could get the station across state lines. Reviews.Title: LOVE IT

Reviews.Content: I am so impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX.  I have been looking and comparing similar products for more than a year. Reviews.Title: BEATS ANY TABLET OUT THERE
Reviews.Author: alzera morrison
Reviews.Content: It's the best electronic of its kind.  The mayday feature is awesome!!! To think if I need help I don't ever have to hear again, "due to high call volume your call will be answered in 1 hour."!!!!! Awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Enjoy very much
Reviews.Author: Judy Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: I like the larger screen, I can take pictures. The picture is so much clearer. I t is not as heavy as my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: We love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Budge
Reviews.Content: After having this tablet for less than a week, both of my kids fight over who gets to use this new Kindle Fire instead of our iPad.  It's really fast and the picture quality is amazing.  And best of all...NO ITUNES!  I was a little concerned before buying this about not having access to Google Apps.  However, most apps were available through the Amazon App store.  Other things, like Google Maps, was available in it's full version using the Silk browser, which is really fast as well.  And if you really need an app you can't find in the Amazon App store, there are simple ways to get your apps from Google without needing to root your device.  Just search online...it's really easy.The only thing this tablet is missing that I can find is the lack of a GPS.  But for $170 less than an iPad, and for a faster processor and better display than almost any other tablet on the market, I can live without a GPS.  For the record, we are streaming videos to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and an iPad at the same time using the Corsair Voyager Air.  It works flawlessly on both devices.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Hardware. Wish...
Reviews.Author: Roberto Fonseca
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is an excellent tablet. No doubt. FireOS 3.1 is also very polished OS. When tying it onto the Prime membership, it makes it a winning combination. There are a few reasons why I can't give 5 stars to this Kindle:1. No Google integration - Yes, I know what everyone else will say. If you really want that you should've bought either Google hardware or go with Samsung, etc. Sure, you're right. But no, that doesn't mean Google integration should not be part of the package. What happened if Google decided not to support any Amazon app (and just removed them all from Play store)? I wish Amazon would just allow Google apps in and let the market decide who they want to go with. Again, this hardware is just plain beautiful.2. Problem with speakers - Within the first few weeks I had a problem with speakers where they just stopped working.After reaching out to Mayday (awesome service, Amazon!) the service person suggested that I would insert/remove headphone jack and see if that would fix the issue. It did immediately. The person went on to say that it was a known issue and product development was working on it. I just wish there was some communication/fix on the issue already.Overall this is a great device. I am still enjoying it very much and look forward to updates to the ecosystem. I hope Amazon continues developing both software and hardware.

Reviews.Title: After the first 24 hours, it appears to be a solid tablet
Reviews.Author: Thomas S.
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 32MB 4G LTE (Verizon) version, and after the first 24 hours I'm very pleased.  Connecting to my WiFi was simple and without problems.  Adding the device to my existing Verizon account did require my calling Verizon's tech support, but that's probably because I live out from town and wasn't getting a strong enough signal.  However, Verizon tech support was very helpful and quickly resolved the problem.  There was also a glitch connecting to my email account on my ISP, but that seems to have been a problem at their end, and has been resolved.  Connecting to my Gmail account was seamless.I've found the frequent complaint of not enough apps (compared to as standard Android) to be a non issue for me.  I've had no problem finding the apps I need and want, or acceptable replacements in cases where the ones I'm use to aren't available.It would be nice if the HDX came with Google maps/navigator installed, but I have that on my phone, so it's not a big issue.  Besides Map Quest maps/navigation is free at the Kindle app store.  It may not be quite up to Google maps, but then again, maybe it is.  I really haven't an opportunity to try it yet.All in all, I'm pleased with my device, and I'm giving it 4 stars only because I've only had it for one day.=======================  Comments added on 2/27/2014 ==================================================I'm now two weeks into owning my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 (Verizon), and I've added another star to my rating to make it a 5-star rating.  I stand by all my comments above, and would like to add that I find the management and use of my Kindle library so much easier with this tablet than with my old (Gen. 3, I think) Kindle.  With this device I get to see the cover of the book I'm reading each time I open it on the carrousel, so I can remember the name of the book I'm reading.  On my old Kindle, I usually only saw the title and author when I first started reading and quickly forgot both (hey, I'm 70 years old).I've installed Waze navigation app, and it works very well - not that I will use my tablet often for navigation, but it's nice to have.Like most, if not all, Android based tablets, it doesn't get as strong a 4G or 3G signal as my Android phone, but I'm usually connected to WiFi, so that's not particularly important to me, which I'm sure begs the question of why did I buy a 4G model to begin with.  The answer is simple - I wanted to.All in all I find the Kindle Fire HDX far superior to my wife's Android tablet, and I'm very pleased with it.  So far, I've found no down side.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, fast with beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I gave the Kindle Fire HDX 4 stars because of not having access to Google Play Store for even more apps. The "plus" is you are allowed to install apps from 3rd parties via a selection in the setting menu. I sometimes have the need to remote in to our servers at work using RDP. I can do that with the Kindle Fire HDX. I tried several RDP apps available through Amazon and the results weren't satisfactory. I got an app from a 3rd party and now I seamlessly access the servers I need to get to and can even access my workstation desktop. I added a bluetooth keyboard and am very happy with my choice of the Kindle. Great video and graphics. As an e-book reader? Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Tery
Reviews.Content: I've had a Kindle Fire for 2 years and will still continue to use it.  But the Kindle Fired HDX 8.9 is so clear, easy to use and hours of fun.  The books and apps are so easy to download.  I am loving it.

Reviews.Title: So clear, so much faster
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "not too old to rock."
Reviews.Content: I love my fire!  I use it everyday and it is so much nicer than my old kindle or my old nook..  The picture is great, the sound is much improved.  the only thing I don't like is there is no Charging light.  I take mine to bed and use the alarm to wake up to.  It is fast, light and just perfect size for reading or surfing the web.

Reviews.Title: Great looking screen, Faster processor, and 3rd version is a charm
Reviews.Author: A. Wells
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how light it was. The speed bump you get from the first generation fire is huge.Amazon have stepped their game up

Reviews.Title: Great Upgrade in the Kindle family
Reviews.Author: Rick A. Coscarelli
Reviews.Content: This is really a major upgrade to the Kindle line of tablets.  We have the Kindle HDX 8.9 and wait until you use their "MayDay" help function, wow!

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Nikki Crady
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX!! It's so compact and easy to use. I don't have to use my laptop for everything I do on the internet anymore.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kim from Iowa
Reviews.Content: I have been debating for well over a year what type of tablet to upgrade to and I am really glad I waited until the Kindle fire HDX came out. It is the best purchase I have made in a long time. Would highly recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: LAC
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" I had the Kindle Fire 7" and loved that too! Now my husband has that since I got the new one. I use it all the time and take everywhere with me. It is great to show pictures, watch video, play games or just read.

Reviews.Title: what dosn't it do
Reviews.Author: becky
Reviews.Content: you name it , everything in a little device, love love it, you can take it with you no problem.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: charles h stewart
Reviews.Content: Speed, clarity, picture quality and ease are great. Much easier to use than the I-Pad Air. Love to use it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire sizzles
Reviews.Author: Pam Amato
Reviews.Content: Love this product.  Convienient to use however a few tasks have been tricky so I only gave it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: More to Sweden, please.
Reviews.Author: Oskar Lorentzi Wall
Reviews.Content: No form of video downloading/streaming available in Sweden. Word not available, I cant view .docx documents.Audiobooks is wonderful though.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight and works great
Reviews.Author: J. Witoszynski "Vidman"
Reviews.Content: I really like the Fire HDX. It runs apps smoothly and is organized well. And it is really light (I'm glad I got an extra case because I think I would be afraid of dropping it.) Highly recommend it especially if you have a Prime membership.

Reviews.Title: The best Kindle i have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Sonya K. Sallee
Reviews.Content: I love the clarity of the screen.  I love watching movies on the larger screen.  The instant help is great. I take my Kindle everywhere, haven't taken any pics, but that's on the list next.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy A. Shaw
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!!!! I don't know how I ever did without this!!! Much easier to tote my Kindle with me than to have 3-4 paperback books shoved in my purse!! Sitting at the doctor's, eating lunch, ...can pass the time with my Kindle and absolutely love it. It's the best gift I have ever received!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Bernice Archer
Reviews.Content: This is amazing and so easy to use.Love it.  I bought it to record dirt races at a track.. works amazing.v

Reviews.Title: It's Great! I love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the Fire which I had for 2 years and used it every day. I went to the FireHDX 8.9  for the bigger screen and do not regret it. I have found it just as easy to use and love the larger screen without adding any weight. My only complaint is so far, I have not found a way to delete a page of email messages at one time. This I could do on my fire.It is a great tablet for my uses and would recommend it to anyone who likes to read.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Leslie Becker
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and I absolutely love it. I had a Fire HD 8.9 and was very happy with it but I was excited about the changes they made with the HDX so I just had to have one. The graphics are amazing and I am very happy with the placement of the power and volume buttons. Also, because of the slimmer profile and the lighter weight it is much nicer to hold. I'm already looking forward to the next model upgrade. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: I take it everywhere!
Reviews.Author: M. Williams "mjsw"
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic table/reader. There are more than ample apps for what ever your interests are. And they are reasonably priced and often free! I get my news, my games and my books all in one device. The only negative item I have found is you can not use any application that uses Flash. And some videos won't play on it. For what it DOES do, it out weights the couple of things it doesn't do.

Reviews.Title: im in love!!
Reviews.Author: raquel
Reviews.Content: this is my 3rd kindle and I love it!!!  its nice and slim.  I can now enjoy my movies. thanks
